T03D3796:5b-13: 'phel ba ni sems kyis bzung ba'i mthu yin la

T03D3796:5b-15: lus kyi bye brag de la rab tu bstan pas
T03D3796:5b-16: te / / na / bag chags kyis ni dkrugs pa'i sems //
T03D3796:5b-17: rnam par rtog pa mang po'i gnas //
T03D3796:5b-18: snying gi yul la rab tu gnas //
T03D3796:5b-20: rten du gyur ba'i snying med na sems mi gnas shing /
T03D3796:5b-21: de ma gnas par gyur na dbang po dang bcas
T03D3796:5b-22: pa'i lus nges par mi gnas pas na snying ste
T03D3796:5b-23: / rab tu gces pa ni hri da ya zhes grags so //
T03D3796:5b-24: de bzhin du rang bzhin gyis shes rab kyi pha
T03D3796:5b-25: rol tu phyin pa med na rnam par mi rtog
T03D3796:5b-26: pa'i ye shes dmigs pa gang la bsten nas kyang
T03D3796:5b-28: de ma skyes par gyur na ji ltar lam dang /
T03D3796:5b-30: de bas na 'di yang hri da ya zhes gsungs te rab tu gces pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3796:5b-31: de la bsten pa ni lam lnga dang /
T03D3796:5b-32: de'i 'bras bu rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes dang /
T03D3796:5b-33: de dag ston pa'i gzung rnams so //
T03D3796:5b-34: de dag las kyang rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye
T03D3796:5b-35: shes ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par
T03D3796:5b-36: bzhag pa la bstan pas gtso bo ste /
T03D3796:5b-37: rang bzhin gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang gnyis su med pa dang /
T03D3796:5b-38: lam dang gzung dag kyang de thob par bya ba'i ched du sbyor ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3796:5b-39: de bas na slob dpon phyogs kyi glang po'i zhal snga nas kyang /
T03D3796:5b-40: shes rab pha rol phyin gnyis med //
T03D3796:5b-41: ye shes de ni de bzhin gshegs //
T03D3796:5b-42: bsgrub bya de don sbyor ba yis //
T03D3796:5b-43: gzhung dang lam dag de'i sgra yin //
T03D3796:6a-0: de la gzhung ni 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag @6a * //
T03D3796:6a-1: brgya pa la sogs pa sngar bstan pas bsdus pa gnyis so //
T03D3796:6a-3: rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyang 'chad par byed pa las gtan la 'bebs so //
T03D3796:6a-4: de ltar rnams par phye bas yum 'di'i ngo bo bstan nas /
T03D3796:6a-5: da ni nges pa'i tshig bstan par bya ste /
T03D3796:6a-6: shes rab ces bya ba ni /
T03D3796:6a-7: gzhan sgra shes dang so sor ni //
T03D3796:6a-8: rang rig rab tu shes phyir dang /
T03D3796:6a-9: rab zhi 'thob shes rab phul byung //
T03D3796:6a-10: yon tan 'thob shes phyir shes rab //
T03D3796:6a-12: lam dang po gnyis la ni dang po'o //
T03D3796:6a-13: mthong ba'i lam dang 'bras bu la ni gnyis pa'o //
T03D3796:6a-14: kun rdzob kyi ye shes la ni gsum pa'o //
T03D3796:6a-15: bsgom pa'i lam la ni bzhi pa'o //
T03D3796:6a-16: khyad par gyi lam la ni nges tshig lnga pa sbyar zhing gzhung la btags te'o //
T03D3796:6a-17: rang bzhin la ni 'bras bu'i ming gis so //
T03D3796:6a-18: de la ji ltar na shes rab de dag la pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya zhe na /
T03D3796:6a-19: byis pa rnams kyi yul du gyur pa 'khor ba ni tshu rol yin te /
T03D3796:6a-20: de las 'das shing ring du song ba 'jig rten
T03D3796:6a-21: las 'das pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to
T03D3796:6a-22: // des na 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
T03D3796:6a-23: de'i phyir rgyal ba'i yum bar ma las kyang /
T03D3796:6a-24: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gang yang 'di
T03D3796:6a-25: skad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
T03D3796:6a-27: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu shes rab kyi
T03D3796:6a-28: pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba gang yin
T03D3796:6a-29: pa de ni ring du song ba ste /
T03D3796:6a-30: gang las ring du song ba zhes bya zhe na /
T03D3796:6a-31: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu phung po rnams las ring du song bas na /
T03D3796:6a-32: de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3796:6a-33: de bas na pa ra'i sgra ni pa ra yad ta zhes bya bar bsgyur ro //
T03D3796:6a-34: yang na pa ra'i sgras ni mchog bstan la de
T03D3796:6a-35: la dngos po'i rkyen sbyar ba ni dngos po'i mchog
T03D3796:6a-38: rgya che ba dang yun ring ched du bya //
T03D3796:6a-39: mi zad rgyun mi 'chad cing tshegs med la //
T03D3796:6a-40: dbang 'byor bsngo dang rtsom pa dag dang //
T03D3796:6a-41: 'thob dang rgyu mthun 'grub phyir dam pa'i dngos //
T03D3796:6b-0: yun ring goms shing thams dang 'bras @6b bu mchog /'di dag theg pa dman las mchog gyur dngos //
T03D3796:6b-2: yang na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' gang
T03D3796:6b-3: zag mchog dag gis bstan pa'i phyir yang mchog gi
T03D3796:6b-4: dngos po'o // gzhan yang gzhan la sogs pa'i mchog
T03D3796:6b-5: tu gnod pa las thar bar byed pas na gnyis
T03D3796:6b-7: gzhan dag ni shes bya'i pha rol tu phyin pas na pha rol tu phyin par 'dren te /
T03D3796:6b-8: de'i tshe ni phyin pa'i sgra rdzogs par drang ste /
T03D3796:6b-9: ai ta sam dz'a ta zhes skad kyi byings la 'don pas so //
T03D3796:6b-10: yi ge pa'i ring po nyid ni gtsug lag gi tshig yin pas 'gal ba med do //
T03D3796:6b-11: nges pa'i tshig tha ma 'di ni dngos su na 'bras bu la sbyar te /
T03D3796:6b-12: gzhan la ni btags nas so //
T03D3796:6b-13: lhag ma ni ci rigs su ngo bo la sbyar ro //
T03D3796:6b-14: de ltar ngo bo dang des tshig rgyas par bstan
T03D3796:6b-15: pa las 'dir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T03D3796:6b-16: pa rnam par phye ba de dag las gang la
T03D3796:6b-19: yang na 'bras bu'i bdag nyid gnyis su med pa'i ye shes de la phyag 'tshal te /
T03D3796:6b-20: de ni rang bzhin gyis rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las tha mi dad pa ste /
T03D3796:6b-21: de ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes tsam gyis nges par byas pas so //
T03D3796:6b-22: de ltar na rnams par mi rtog par mi 'gyur te rang bzhin la rtog pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3796:6b-24: des gang yang yul du ma byas pa'i phyir te rang bzhin yin la /
T03D3796:6b-25: de yang rnam par mi rtog par grub kyi gal te des yul du byas na /
T03D3796:6b-26: de yang ye shes la ltos pas byas par 'gyur bas rang bzhin ma yin la /
T03D3796:6b-27: de yang rnam par rtog pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
T03D3796:6b-28: de'i phyir na yang dag par na rang bzhin ni
T03D3796:6b-29: rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis kyang
T03D3796:6b-30: mi gzigs te / de'i don ni ci'i phyir zhe na /
T03D3796:6b-31: sangs rgyas kyis mkhyen nas chos rnams ma gzigs phyir zhes 'chad par byed do //
T03D3796:6b-32: de bas na ci yang ma mthong ba ni mthong ba dam pa'o zhes mdo las gsungs so //
T03D3796:6b-33: de ltar rang bzhin dang dbyer med pas rang bzhin
T03D3796:6b-34: dang 'bras bu dag ni de nyid dang gzhan du
T03D3796:7a-0: gzung dang lam ni de'i ched du sbyor ba'o zhes sngar @7a * //
T03D3796:7a-2: de'i phyir na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T03D3796:7a-3: pa gnyis su med pa'i ye shes la phyag 'tshal
T03D3796:7a-5: rgyal ba'i yum bar ma las kyang /
T03D3796:7a-6: btsun pa sh'a ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T03D3796:7a-7: gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
T03D3796:7a-8: phyag 'tshal ba de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye
T03D3796:7a-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa /
T03D3796:7a-11: koo shi ka de de bzhin no //
T03D3796:7a-13: gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
T03D3796:7a-14: phyag 'tshal ba ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
T03D3796:7a-17: koo shi ka 'di las byung ba ni sangs rgyas
T03D3796:7a-18: bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
T03D3796:7a-19: pa nyid do // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
T03D3796:7a-20: nyid kyi ye shes las ni shes rab kyi pha
T03D3796:7a-21: rol tu phyin par brjod do zhes gsungs pa'o //
T03D3796:7a-22: 'dir ni mi 'dod pa'i bzhi pa nyid de /
T03D3796:7a-23: de la rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3796:7a-24: gus par zhes bya ba ni dngos po thams cad kyis sam yid rab tu dang bas so //
T03D3796:7a-25: phyag 'tshal lo zhes pa ni mchog tu 'dud par byed pa'o //
T03D3796:7a-27: gang yang ma dmigs na btud pas ci zhig sbyin zhe na /
T03D3796:7a-28: chos thams cad ni rang gi rnam par rtog pa'i
T03D3796:7a-29: dbang tsam gyis skye zhing 'phel ba la sogs par
T03D3796:7a-30: 'gyur bas na yid dang ba'i dbang gis ci yang
T03D3796:7a-31: med pa la'ang btud pas 'bras bu yid du 'ong
T03D3796:7a-32: ba sbyin la / gzhan don dam par gang yang med du zin kyang /
T03D3796:7a-33: kun rdzob tu ni rgyal ba'i yum 'di nyid gdul bya dang 'tsham pa'i bkod pas gnas te /
T03D3796:7a-35: gdul bya'i skye bo la brten nas //
T03D3796:7a-36: de bzhin gshegs pas de dang der //
T03D3796:7a-37: khyod nyid gcig pu gzugs mang dang //
T03D3796:7a-38: sna tshogs mtshan du mngon par brjod //
T03D3796:7a-41: tshig yul kun las 'das gang yin //
T03D3796:7a-42: khyod ni gang la'ang mi brten zhin //
T03D3796:7a-43: mtshan med gos pa med pas na //
T03D3796:7a-44: su yis 'dir khyod bstod par nus //
T03D3796:7b-1: khyod la bstod pa ma byas kyang //
T03D3796:7b-2: dgyes mi dgyes las 'das mod kyi //
T03D3796:7b-5: de bas na yum 'di spros pa med cing rtog pa med do zhes te /
T03D3796:7b-6: mchod pa dang phyag la sogs pa spang bar ni mi bya'o ;
T03D3796:7b-7: / de ltar phyag 'tshal ba ci zhig 'grub par 'dod pa yin zhe na /
T03D3796:7b-9: de'i rgyan tshig le'ur byas pa dag / rnam par dbye phyir gus phyag 'tshal //
T03D3796:7b-10: zhes tshig snga ma dang sbyar te /
T03D3796:7b-11: de'i zhes bya ba'i bud med kyi rtags kyis bstan pa'i phyir dang /
T03D3796:7b-12: don gyi dbang gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid dang sbyar ro //
T03D3796:7b-13: de ltar na gang la phyag 'tshal ba shes rab
T03D3796:7b-14: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de nyid kyi rgyan
T03D3796:7b-15: tshig le'ur byas pa dag / rnam par dbye ba'i
T03D3796:7b-16: phyir gus phyag 'tshal zhes tshig rnam par sbyar ro
T03D3796:7b-17: // rgyan zhes bya ba ni tshig le'ur byas pa'i
T03D3796:7b-18: man ngag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T03D3796:7b-19: pa'i don shes par bya ste /
T03D3796:7b-20: de shes pas man ngag 'dis mkhas pa rnams dga'
T03D3796:7b-21: zhing 'di la drin du yang gzo bar 'gyur te
T03D3796:7b-22: / 'di ni dmigs bu lta bu'i phyir ro //
T03D3796:7b-23: de ltar dga' ba bskyed pas na 'di rgyan te dpe'i ming nyid do ;
T03D3796:7b-24: / don 'di las brten te 'phags pa byams pa'i zhal snga nas kyang /
T03D3796:7b-25: gzugs rgyan rang bzhin yon tan ldan pa me long nang song nas //
T03D3796:7b-26: mthong ba'i dbang gis mi rnams rab tu dga' ba'i mchog skyed pa //
T03D3796:7b-27: de bzhin legs gsung rtag tu rang bzhin yon tan ldan pa yi ;
T03D3796:7b-28: / chos kyang don rnams phye bas mkhas rnams 'di na dga' mchog skyed //
T03D3796:7b-30: tshig le'ur byas pa dag ces pa ni gzhung gang
T03D3796:7b-31: tshigs su bcad pa rtsa ba bzhi pa yi ge
T03D3796:7b-32: brgyad par byas pa'i ming ste /
T03D3796:7b-33: dbang po'i rdo rje las khyad par du gyur pa'o //
T03D3796:7b-34: rnam par dbye zhes pa ni don tsam zhig ste
T03D3796:7b-35: 'chad par byed pa las 'phags pa rnam par grol
T03D3796:7b-36: sdes / mthu yi don mthong sgo nas ni //
T03D3796:7b-37: go bar sla phyir ngag dang ni //
T03D3796:7b-38: tshig sogs sbyor ba ma byas par //
T03D3796:7b-39: mkhan po yang dag rnam snang mdzad //
T03D3796:7b-40: bla ma bzang la phyag 'tshal te //
T03D3796:8a-2: 'di ni seng ge bzang pos byas //
T03D3796:8a-4: bzhi pa 'di ni rgyu mtshan nyid du lta'o //
T03D3796:8a-5: tshig le'ur byas pa de rnams par dbye ba'i phyir phyag 'tshal bar ni bstan na /
T03D3796:8a-6: de rnam par phye ba nyid la dgos pa ci yod ces rtog pa la /
T03D3796:8a-7: kun gyi rgyan du 'gyur ba'i phyir //
T03D3796:8a-9: kun zhes pa ni ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi'o //
T03D3796:8a-10: rgyan du 'gyur ba zhes bya ba ni 'di skad ston te /
T03D3796:8a-11: skyes pa'am bud med gang zhig gi gzugs la dga' ba skye ba'i rgyu ni rgyan rnams yin te /
T03D3796:8a-12: 'on kyang rgyan de dag dri ma dang bcas par
T03D3796:8a-13: gyur na dga' bar byed mi nus pas na rgyan
T03D3796:8a-14: gyis rgyan ni rgyan de'i dri ma med par bya
T03D3796:8a-15: ba yin no // de bzhin du mkhas pa dga'
T03D3796:8a-16: bar byed pa'i rgyan ni tshig le'ur byas pa nyid
T03D3796:8a-17: ba yin no // do // zhes bstan du zin kyang kha cig ma rtogs pa'am /
T03D3796:8a-18: log par rtogs pa'i dbang gis tshig le'ur byas pa
T03D3796:8a-19: 'di ni rgyal ba'i yum rnams kyi don legs par
T03D3796:8a-20: ston par nus pa ma yin pas 'di rgyan ma
T03D3796:8a-21: yin no snyam du klan ka'i dri ma skye srid
T03D3796:8a-22: do // slob dpon gyi zhal snga nas 'grel pa
T03D3796:8a-23: don gsal ba sdeb sbyor spangs pas drang thad du
T03D3796:8a-24: bstan pa 'di mdzad pas de dag gis log par
T03D3796:8a-25: do // rtogs pa dang / ma rtogs pa'i rgyu
T03D3796:8a-26: las byung ba'i dri ma ngan pa 'joms pas na
T03D3796:8a-28: rgyan du byed pas na rgyan gyis brgyan nyid de /
T03D3796:8a-29: de bas na 'di ni dri ma sel bas rgyan te /
T03D3796:8a-30: ji skad du slob dpon ka ma la sh'i la'i
T03D3796:8a-31: zhal snga nas de nyid kyi phyir klan ka ngan
T03D3796:8a-32: pa'i dri ma bsal bas na 'di ni dbu ma'i
T03D3796:8a-33: rgyan zhes bya'o zhes bshad pa lta bu'o //
T03D3796:8a-34: bzhi pa 'di ni rgyu mtshan nyid ston pa'o //
T03D3796:8a-35: de ltar na 'grel pa'i gzhung 'di rjod par byed pa ste /
T03D3796:8a-36: de'i brjod par bya ba yang sgra'i brjod par bya ba ni tshig le'ur byas pa kho na'o //
T03D3796:8a-37: don gyis brjod par bya ba ni rgyal ba skyed ma thams cad do //
T03D3796:8a-38: dgos pa yang dngos su ni tshig le'ur byas pa'i don legs par bstan pa ste /
T03D3796:8a-39: de'i yang dgos pa ni tshig le'ur byas pa de rgol ba rnams la rgyan nyid du bsgrub pa'o //
T03D3796:8b-0: gzhan dag ni tshig @8b le'ur byas pa'i don legs
T03D3796:8b-1: par bstan pas de rgyan nyid du grub pa ni
T03D3796:8b-3: des rgyal ba skyed ma'i don ma lus pa shes pa nas gzung ste /
T03D3796:8b-4: mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du ni dgos pa'i yang dgos pa'o zhes rtog ste /
T03D3796:8b-5: de ni de ltar 'grub pa nyid 'grel pa 'ba' zhig gis mi srid la /
T03D3796:8b-6: rtsa ba'i gzhung nyid kyi dbang du byas par yang 'og nas 'chad pas mi 'thad pa nyid do //
T03D3796:8b-7: gzhan yang tshigs su bcad pa dang po'i dbang gis
T03D3796:8b-8: gzhung dbye bar dam bca' bas brtsams pa mthar dbyung
T03D3796:8b-10: phung po dang nyon mongs pa dang /
T03D3796:8b-11: khas blangs pa dang dam bcas pa dag ni khur yin la /
T03D3796:8b-12: skyes bu dam pa rnams ni legs par blangs pa'i
T03D3796:8b-13: khur bya ba ma rdzogs kyi bar du mi 'dor
T03D3796:8b-14: te / gzhan don brtse ba can rnams srog phyir yang //
T03D3796:8b-15: rang gi nus pa lhod par mi byed de //
T03D3796:8b-16: skyes bu dam pa khur lci khur ba dang //
T03D3796:8b-17: nyam nga'i lam du nam yang 'dor mi byed //
T03D3796:8b-20: bstan par dam bca' ba dang /
T03D3796:8b-21: nyid kyis sbyor ba'i 'grel ba'i dgos pa la sogs
T03D3796:8b-22: pa bstan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig rnams par
T03D3796:8b-23: bkrol ba'o // da ni slob dpon bdag nyid sngon
T03D3796:8b-24: gyi slob dpon gyi lugs la mkhas par bstan pas
T03D3796:8b-25: 'gro ba rnams rang gi 'grel pa la 'jug par
T03D3796:8b-26: bkrol ba'o // bya ba dang / gzhung du ma
T03D3796:8b-27: tshol ba'i 'jug pa po rnams la'ang phan gdags pa'i
T03D3796:8b-28: bkrol ba'o // bya ba dang / phyir / sngon
T03D3796:8b-29: gyi slob dpon gyis mdzad pa'i gzhung gdags pa bstan
T03D3796:8b-30: bkrol ba'o // bya ba dang / phyir / pa'i phyir / 'gro ba'i chags la chags med mdzad //
T03D3796:8b-31: ces pa la sogs pa smos te /
T03D3796:8b-32: kha cig na re yi ge aa ni ring po yin pas lhag par ston te /
T03D3796:8b-33: des na kun tu chags pa'o zhes zer na /
T03D3796:8b-34: de dag gis ni mtshams sbyor ba ma rtogs pa ste /
T03D3796:8b-35: gal te ring po yin na mtshams sbyar bar mi 'gyur ro //
T03D3796:8b-36: de'i phyir yi ge aa ni thung du ste dgag pa nyid do //
T03D3796:8b-37: de la mdor bsdus na 'phags pa thogs med dang /
T03D3796:8b-38: slob dpon dbyig gnyen dag gis skabs brgyad du phye
T03D3796:8b-39: mod kyi don gzhan du rnam par rig pa'i grub
T03D3796:9a-2: tshig le'ur byas pa theg pa chen po dbu ma'i
T03D3796:9a-3: lta ba 'di ni slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis de'i
T03D3796:9a-4: yul du ma gyur pas na /
T03D3796:9a-5: 'phags pa thogs med pa 'od byed pa brnyes pas kyang de 'dul ba dang 'tsham par bkrol te /
T03D3796:9a-6: sems can gcig gi don gyi phyir //
T03D3796:9a-7: phyi mtha'i bar du gnas par bgyi //
T03D3796:9a-8: zhes gsungs pa'i rjes su 'brang bas so //
T03D3796:9a-9: de ltar de dag gi skabs kyi don ma brjod
T03D3796:9a-10: cing rnam par rig pa'i zhen pa ma spangs pas
T03D3796:9a-11: na / des byas byas pa min mthong ste //
T03D3796:9a-12: 'phags pa'i nang du gtogs pa yi ;

T03D3796:14a-0: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa @14a * //

T03D3796:19b-1: 'dod chags la spyod pa la sogs pa'i rtsa ba'i
T03D3796:19b-3: re re'i yang phye bas brgyad khri bzhi stong rnams so //
T03D3796:19b-4: de dag gi gnyen por gyur pa ni thub pa
T03D3796:19b-5: chen po'i chos kyi 'khor lo ma lus pa ste
T03D3796:19b-6: chos ni bstan pa'i chos gtso bor byas pa'o //
T03D3796:19b-7: 'khor lo ni gdul bya'i rgyud la 'pho bar snang bas na'am /
T03D3796:19b-8: tshogs kyi don gyi phyir 'khor lo ste sgra'i don ni de dag dang nye ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3796:19b-9: ma lus pa ni chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong ste /
T03D3796:19b-10: de la chos kyi phung po gcig gi tshad ji tsam zhe na /
T03D3796:19b-11: de la tshig le'u byas pa stong nyid do //
T03D3796:19b-12: tshigs su bcad pa re re la'ang yig 'bru sum cu rtsa gnyis yod do //
T03D3796:19b-13: de ltar na chos kyi phung po thams cad la
T03D3796:19b-14: ni tshigs su bcad pa bye ba phrag brgyad dang
T03D3796:19b-16: 'dir ni re zhig thun mong gi grangs su bgrang ba'o //
T03D3796:19b-17: theg pa bla na med pa'i dbang du byas te /
T03D3796:19b-18: dbang po'i glang po che rab brtan gyis bkur bar
T03D3796:19b-19: 'os pa'i snag tshas ni chos kyi phung po gcig
T03D3796:19b-20: 'dri bar nus so zhes gsungs te /
T03D3796:19b-21: de ltar byas na mdo gang dag las 'phags pa
T03D3796:19b-22: lhas byis byin gyi glang po che lnga stong gis
T03D3796:19b-23: bkur bar bya ba'i glegs bam rnams kha ton du
T03D3796:19b-24: rjod par byed do zhes gsungs pa 'di yang rigs
T03D3796:19b-25: par 'gyur ro // chos kyi phung po de snyed
T03D3796:19b-26: yod pa nyid na ci'i phyir deng sang 'dzam bu'i
T03D3796:19b-27: gling na rab tu mi snang zhe na /
T03D3796:19b-28: kha cig ni 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag na
T03D3796:19b-29: spyod cing gzhan yang phal cher klu rnams kyi gnas
T03D3796:19b-31: bstan pa rin chen mchog ltar bzang la 'phan med par //
T03D3796:19b-32: rnam par dag tshul gang yin klu mgo gdengs ka can //
T03D3796:19b-33: chen po rnams kyis gtsug gi rgyan bzhin gus mnos nas /
T03D3796:19b-34: sa yi gting na gnas pa'i rab rib sel bar mdzad //
T03D3796:19b-36: chos kyi phung po de dag kyang sde snod gsum nyid du rnam par gzhag ste /
T03D3796:19b-38: dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang /
T03D3796:19b-39: lung du bstan pa'i sde dang /
T03D3796:19b-40: tshigs su bcad pa'i sde dang /
T03D3796:19b-41: ched du brjod pa'i sde dag ni 'phags pa nyan
T03D3796:19b-42: thos rnams kyi mdo sde'i sde snod du bsdus pa'o
T03D3796:20a-2: de lta bu byung ba'i sde dang /
T03D3796:20a-3: skyes pa'i rabs dag 'khor dang bcas te ni 'dul ba'i sde snod du bsdus pa'o //
T03D3796:20a-5: rmad du byung ba'i sde dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i mdo sde'i sde snod du rtogs pa'o //
T03D3796:20a-6: gtan la phab pa'i sde ni gnyi ga'i chos mngon pa'i sde snod du bsdus pa'o //
T03D3796:20a-7: sde snod de dag kyang sde snod gsum mam gnyis kyang yin te /
T03D3796:20a-8: sde snod dag ni gsum mam gnyis kyang rung //
T03D3796:20a-9: bsdus pa'i phyir na rgyu ni dgur 'dod do //
T03D3796:20a-10: de ni bag chags rtogs dang zhi ba dang //
T03D3796:20a-11: rab tu rtogs las rnam par grol bar byed //
T03D3796:20a-12: mdo dang chos mngon 'dul ba dag / mdor na don ni rnam bzhir 'dod //
T03D3796:20a-13: blo dang ldan pas de shes nas //
T03D3796:20a-14: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa thob //
T03D3796:20a-15: gnas rnams dang ni mtshan nyid dang //
T03D3796:20a-16: chos don smos phyir mdo yin no //
T03D3796:20a-17: mngon du'i phyir dang yang yang dang //
T03D3796:20a-18: zil gnon rtogs phyir mngon pa'i chos //
T03D3796:20a-19: ltung dang 'byung dang ldang ba dang //
T03D3796:20a-20: nges par 'byung dang gang zag dang //
T03D3796:20a-21: bcas pa dang ni rab dbye dang //
T03D3796:20a-22: rnam par nges phyir 'dul ba nyid //
T03D3796:20a-24: de las rgyal ba'i yul rje btsun 'bum ldan ma
T03D3796:20a-25: la sogs pa 'di dag ni theg pa chen po'i
T03D3796:20a-26: sde snod byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mdo shin
T03D3796:20a-27: tu rgyas pa'i sde snod du bsdus pa yin par
T03D3796:20a-28: shes par bya'o // yum 'di nyis la mchod pa dang /
T03D3796:20a-29: bstod pa la sogs pa byas pas ni gzhung gzhan
T03D3796:20a-30: la mchod pa bas ches bsod nams khyad par du
T03D3796:20a-31: 'phags shing 'di la ma gus pa yang de ltar
T03D3796:20a-34: 'gro ba de gnas min la skrag pa gdung byed 'gyur //
T03D3796:20a-35: bsod nams ma yin phung chen bsags byas yun ring du //
T03D3796:20a-36: rigs med grogs ngan dge sngon ma bsags blo ma sbyangs //
T03D3796:20a-37: chos 'dis skrag 'gyur 'di ni don chen 'di las ltung //
T03D3796:20a-39: blo chung de yis thos nas 'di ni spong byed de //
T03D3796:20a-40: spangs nas skyabs med gyur pa de ni mnar med ltung //
T03D3796:20a-41: zhes gsungs shing mtshams med kyi las byas pa las
T03D3796:20a-42: ches yum 'di la spong bar byed pa ma rungs
T03D3796:20b-0: so // zhes rgyal ba'i yum rgyas par @20b bstan pa dag las gsal bar gsungs so //
T03D3796:20b-1: ma lus pa rnam pa thams cad du bskor ba mdzad pa zhes bya ba ni /
T03D3796:20b-2: kha cig na te dang po ni ri dgas kyi
T03D3796:20b-3: nags su 'phags pa koondi nya la sogs pa la
T03D3796:20b-4: bden pa bzhi'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te 'di
T03D3796:20b-6: de nas ni rgyal po'i khab tu bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la snying po dang /
T03D3796:20b-7: mngon par rtogs pa'i don ston pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bstan te /
T03D3796:20b-8: de ni dgongs pas bshad pa'i 'khor lo gnyis pa yin pas na /
T03D3796:20b-9: lha'i bu dag gis smras pa /
T03D3796:20b-10: kye ma aa la la 'dzam bu'i gling du chos
T03D3796:20b-11: kyi 'khor lo gnyis pa bskor ba mthong ngo zhes
T03D3796:20b-13: de'i 'og tu ri ma la ya la sogs par
T03D3796:20b-14: chos mngon pa gtan la phab pa'i sde snod mtshan
T03D3796:20b-15: nyid gsum rnam par phye bas nges pa'i don bstan
T03D3796:20b-16: pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te /
T03D3796:20b-17: 'di ni chos kyi 'khor lo ma lus pa rnam pa thams cad du bskor ba'o zhes zer ro //
T03D3796:20b-18: de dag gis ni legs par ma smras te /
T03D3796:20b-20: thub pa chen pos ni de ltar rim gyis chos bstan pa med de /
T03D3796:20b-21: ji skad du 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa skye ba 'byung ba bstan pa las kyang /
T03D3796:20b-22: rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas /
T03D3796:20b-23: sangs rgyas shin tu rnam par sangs rgyas pa zhes
T03D3796:20b-24: bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug ste
T03D3796:20b-25: / ring nge 'dzin sangs rgyas shin tu rnam par
T03D3796:20b-26: sangs rgyas pa la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu
T03D3796:20b-27: sems can rnams ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sku
T03D3796:20b-29: sku ji snyed pa de snyed kyi gsung dang thugs
T03D3796:20b-30: dang kun tu gnas par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs la
T03D3796:20b-32: kye ma rgyal sras khyod ltos shig /'dzam bu'i gling rnams thams cad na /
T03D3796:20b-33: bde gshegs 'di na bzhugs snam byed //
T03D3796:20b-34: bdag cag rnams ni 'di snyam du //
T03D3796:20b-35: ri rab rtse la bde gshegs snyam //
T03D3796:20b-36: 'jig rten khams rnams gzhan na yang //
T03D3796:20b-37: sangs rgyas ngo mtshar rmad re che //
T03D3796:20b-39: rgya cher ni 'phags pa sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i mdo las shes par bya'o //
T03D3796:21a-1: yang lha'i bu rnams kyis chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis
T03D3796:21a-2: pa bsgrags pa nyid de'i dang po ni gang zhig
T03D3796:21a-3: yin / 'phags pa koondi nya la sogs pa la bshad pa'o zhe na /
T03D3796:21a-4: rgyal ba skyed ma'i gzhung rnam pa gsum car la byang chub kyang gnyis pa zhes smos na /
T03D3796:21a-5: de'i tshe gang zhig dang por bya /
T03D3796:21a-6: de'i phyir gnyis pa zhes bya ba ni /
T03D3796:21a-7: lha'i bu de dag nyid kyis de'i sngar gang thos
T03D3796:21a-8: pa de tsam las gnyis par gzhag gi / dang
T03D3796:21a-9: po nges par bden pa bzhi'i chos kyi 'khor lo
T03D3796:21a-10: zhes bya ba 'di la lung dang rigs pa ci
T03D3796:21a-11: yang med do // gzhan yang chos kyi 'khor lo ni mthong ba'i lam mo //
T03D3796:21a-12: zhes bstan pa yang nges pa med pa kho na ste /
T03D3796:21a-13: chos kyi 'khor lo kha cig ni tshogs kyi lam mo //
T03D3796:21a-14: kha cig ni sbyor ba'i lam mo //
T03D3796:21a-15: kha cig ni bar chad med pa'i lam gyi bar ro //
T03D3796:21a-16: de bzhin du 'khor lo gsum pa ni dgongs pa can ma yin la /
T03D3796:21a-17: 'khor lo gnyis pa rgyal ba'i yum ni dgongs pa can no //
T03D3796:21a-18: zhes bya ba 'di ni log par brjod pa ste /
T03D3796:21a-19: gang zhig rigs pas gnod par byar rung ba de ni nges pa'i don du gzhag cing /
T03D3796:21a-20: lung dang rigs pas legs par grub pa ni drang
T03D3796:21a-21: ba'i don du gzhag pa 'di ni rab tu 'khrugs
T03D3796:21a-22: pa'o // 'on kyang don 'di ni dbu ma'i bstan
T03D3796:21a-23: bcos las gtan la phab par 'gyur ba byang chub
T03D3796:21a-25: de ltar na chos kyi 'khor lo ma lus pa
T03D3796:21a-26: rnam pa thams cad du bskor ba ni skad cig
T03D3796:21a-27: cig gcig kho na la bskor ba ste /
T03D3796:21a-28: de la gdul bya rnams kyis dus yun ring thung
T03D3796:21a-29: dang gsung tha dad par thos pa la sogs par
T03D3796:21a-30: zad de / 'phags pa dam pa'i chos pad ma
T03D3796:21a-31: dkar po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
T03D3796:21a-32: zad de / las kyang / sa rum nas 'thon
T03D3796:21a-33: pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bar gyi bskal
T03D3796:21a-34: pa nyi shu rtsa lngar bcom ldan 'das sh'akya'i gtso
T03D3796:21a-35: bo la mchod pa byas mod kyi /
T03D3796:21a-36: 'dzam bu gling pa la sogs pas ni phyi dro gcig yun du shes so zhes gsungs la /
T03D3796:21a-37: bcom ldan 'das 'di ni yongs su mya ngan las
T03D3796:21a-38: ma 'das te da ltar gzugs kyi skur bzhugs shing
T03D3796:21a-39: 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'jig pa na yang zhing
T03D3796:21a-40: 'di rab tu dag par gnas la /
T03D3796:21b-0: ma 'ongs @21b pa'i bskal pa dpag tu med pa
T03D3796:21b-1: na yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o zhes gsungs te
T03D3796:21b-2: / de'i phyir chos kyi 'khor lo ma lus pa
T03D3796:21b-3: mtha' dag rnam pa thams cad du bskor ro zhes
T03D3796:21b-4: nges par gzung gi tshul 'di ltar bskor zhes dman
T03D3796:21b-5: pa'i 'du shes kyis ni nges par bya ba ga
T03D3796:21b-6: / la nus te ; grangs med pa la su
T03D3796:21b-7: zhig bgrang zhes pa la sogs pa sngar smas pa'o
T03D3796:21b-8: / la nus te ; // mtshan nyid kyi bstan
T03D3796:21b-9: bcos dag la zhes bya ba la gzhung gang dag
T03D3796:21b-10: las dngos po rnams sra ba la sogs pa'i mtshan
T03D3796:21b-11: nyid du yod pa don dam par ston pa ni
T03D3796:21b-12: mtshan nyid kyi bstan bcos so //
T03D3796:21b-13: gang dag las don dam par mtshan nyid med par
T03D3796:21b-14: ston pa ni kun rdzob tu rang gi mtshan nyid
T03D3796:21b-15: tsam du gnas par ston kyang mtshan nyid brjod pa'i
T03D3796:21b-17: kun rdzob ni dngos po ma yin par khas blangs
T03D3796:21b-18: pa'i don nges pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin pas so
T03D3796:21b-19: // rnam pa zhes bya ba ni kha dog dang dbyibs te /
T03D3796:21b-20: me lce zlum pa dang me'i kha dog smug pa la sogs pa'o //
T03D3796:21b-21: rtags zhes bya ba ni mtshon par byed pa'i mtshan ma ste me'i du ba la sogs pa'o //
T03D3796:21b-22: mtshan ma zhes bya ba ni rgyu ste me'i shing la sogs pa'o //
T03D3796:21b-23: chos re re'i yang de dag ma lus par skad
T03D3796:21b-24: cig gcig gis mkhyen pa'i phyir rnam pa thams cad
T03D3796:21b-25: mkhyen pa'o // mi rtag pa la sogs pa zhes
T03D3796:21b-26: pa ni bden pa bzhi la rnam pa brgyad dang
T03D3796:21b-27: mkhyen pa'o // // de dag gi bden pa'i rnam pa brgyad do //
T03D3796:21b-28: theg pa thams cad kyis nges par 'byung ba zhes
T03D3796:21b-29: pa ni gdul bya'i dbang gis theg pa gsum car
T03D3796:21b-30: gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ston pa
T03D3796:21b-32: dge slong dag nga lan stong du ni nyan thos
T03D3796:21b-33: kyi mya ngan las 'da' bas mya ngan las 'das
T03D3796:21b-34: so // lan stong du ni rang sangs rgyas kyi
T03D3796:21b-35: mya ngan las 'da' bas yongs su mya ngan las
T03D3796:21b-38: theg pa rlabs bo ches ni skrag 'gyur zhing //
T03D3796:21b-39: 'di na sems can dman la mos rig nas //
T03D3796:21b-40: byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag nyan thos 'gyur //
T03D3796:21b-41: rang rgyal byang chub bar yang rab tu ston //
T03D3796:22a-0: rgyu mtshan des gtso bor byas te byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod las nyan thos @22a * //
T03D3796:22a-1: dang rang sangs rgyas kyi lam bstan pa mdzad de
T03D3796:22a-2: de la 'dris pa tsam du bya ba'i phyir ro
T03D3796:22a-3: // de kho na nyid mngon sum du mi byed
T03D3796:22a-4: par rten pa zhes bya ba la de kho na
T03D3796:22a-5: nyid ni gang zag la bdag med pa'i mtha' zhi
T03D3796:22a-6: // ba nyid de / de mngon sum du mi
T03D3796:22a-7: byed pa ni bsgoms pas spang bar bya ba'i nyon
T03D3796:22a-8: mongs pa rnams ni mi spong ba'i phyir te /
T03D3796:22a-9: de ma spangs pas na mya ngan las mi 'da' ste /
T03D3796:22a-10: de'i phyir slob dpon gyi zhal snga nas kyang /
T03D3796:22a-11: nyan thos kyi lam ni byang chub sems dpas yongs
T03D3796:22a-12: su shes par bya ba yin gyi mngon sum du
T03D3796:22a-13: bya ba ni ma yin pas bsgom pa'i lam ni
T03D3796:22a-14: ma bstan to // zhes ston par 'gyur ro //
T03D3796:22a-15: bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba zhes bya ba ni bag chags nyid mtshams sbyor ba yin te /
T03D3796:22a-16: gang dag bag chags zad pa de dag ni yang srid par mtshams sbyor ba med pas so //
T03D3796:22a-17: yang na bag chags kyis mtshams sbyor ba ni bag
T03D3796:22a-18: chags kyis mtshams sbyor ba'o zhes gsum pa'i bsdu ba'o
T03D3796:22a-19: // de spangs pa can yin no zhes bya ba ni zad pa dang ldan pa ste /
T03D3796:22a-21: de lta na yang srid par mtshams spyo ba ni bag chags kyi rgyu can yin la /
T03D3796:22a-22: bcom ldan 'das 'di la de mi mnga' bas na
T03D3796:22a-23: rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i sras su gyur pa la
T03D3796:22a-24: sogs pa'i rgyu gang zhig yin zhe na /
T03D3796:22a-25: 'di ni thub pa chen po'i bya ba sgrub pa'i
T03D3796:22a-26: ye shes la gdul bya rnams kyi kha rog dang
T03D3796:22a-28: 'di ni gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa'o zhes
T03D3796:22a-29: bya bar bzung bar zad kyi ci yang mtshams sbyor
T03D3796:22a-30: ba med do // de ltar na rgyal ba'i yum bar ma las /
T03D3796:22a-31: rab 'byor nga'i lus 'di ni rnam pa thams cad
T03D3796:22a-32: mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi gzhi ste zhes gsungs pas
T03D3796:22a-33: sku de nyid ye shes su ma bstan pa ci'i
T03D3796:22a-34: phyir zhe na / byis pa rnams ni rang gi
T03D3796:22a-35: mngon par zhen pa rab tu bstan pas na 'di
T03D3796:22a-36: nyid ye shes so zhes brjod pas yid ches par
T03D3796:22a-37: rab tu dka' bas na gzhi'o zhes 'jig rten pa'i
T03D3796:22a-39: rang gi ngo bos ni ye shes nyid kha dog
T03D3796:22a-40: dang dbyibs su snang zhing ring bsrel la sogs par
T03D3796:22a-41: snang bas na / 'phags pa dge ba'i rtsa ba
T03D3796:22b-0: yongs @22b su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba theg pa
T03D3796:22b-2: nga yis rigs rnam gzhag ma yin //
T03D3796:22b-3: skye ba'ang blangs pa ma yin zhing //
T03D3796:22b-4: de yi kha dog phye ba'ang min //
T03D3796:22b-5: gzugs kyi sku las dman pa med //
T03D3796:22b-7: slob dpon gyi zhal snga nas kyang /
T03D3796:22b-8: kun rdzob tu ye shes kho na longs spyod rdzogs
T03D3796:22b-9: pa'i sku la sogs par snang ba bskyed pa'i sgo
T03D3796:22b-10: nas don bya ba mdzad pa yin pas chos kyi
T03D3796:22b-11: sku yin no zhes 'chad par mdzad de /
T03D3796:22b-12: de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das 'di ni rtag tu ye
T03D3796:22b-13: shes kyi snang ba rab 'byam tshad med pa gcig
T03D3796:22b-14: kho na yin mod kyi ye shes gcig po de
T03D3796:22b-15: kho na la gdul bya'i don mdzad pa'i dbang gis
T03D3796:22b-16: sku dang ye shes du mar btags par zad do
T03D3796:22b-17: // de bas na gdul bya'i so sor 'dzin pas
T03D3796:22b-18: rgyal ba'i ngo bo nyid tha dad par ni mi
T03D3796:22b-20: gzhi zhes bya ba ni byis pa rnams la bdag
T03D3796:22b-21: dang bdag gir 'dzin pa'i gzhir gyur pa phung po
T03D3796:22b-22: la sogs pa yin la de bdag med par shes
T03D3796:22b-23: pa dang / spong ba la sogs par 'byed pas na gzhi ste /
T03D3796:22b-24: lhan cig spyod pa'i ming lhan cig spyod pas thob pa'o //
T03D3796:22b-25: yang na lam thams cad kyi gzhir gyur pa ni gzhi ste /
T03D3796:22b-26: dang por ni de la brten par bya ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3796:22b-27: de'i phyir 'phags pa sa'i snying po 'khor lo bcu
T03D3796:22b-28: pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo las
T03D3796:22b-29: kyang / byis pa dbang po zhen cing le lo can //
T03D3796:22b-30: theg pa gnyis la nan than mi byed pa //
T03D3796:22b-31: theg pa chen po'i 'khor lo ldan mi 'gyur //
T03D3796:22b-32: de ni rgya chen theg chen snod ma yin //
T03D3796:22b-34: de'i tshe ni gzhi'ang yin la /
T03D3796:22b-35: ye shes kyang yin zhes gzhi mthun pa'i bsdu bar bstan to //
T03D3796:22b-36: de ltar phyag 'tshal ba bstan nas /

T03D3796:33a-1: bsdus pa las ji skad du bstan pa'i man ngag la brten te bsgom par bya'o //

T03D3796:33a-6: bya ba yid btud pas gus par brjod par bya'o

T03D3796:33b-16: rnam par dbye'o // ming tha dad pa'i don gyi dbang du byas te /

T03D3796:33b-19: dad pa'i sa zhes bsgrags pa'o //
T03D3796:33b-20: rnam par dbye ba'i dbang du byas te /

T03D3796:33b-26: sems bskyed pa'i dbye ba las ni 'dun pa dang /

T03D3796:34a-4: rtags dag ste rnam pa dgus yid la bya'o //
T03D3796:34a-5: de la rtags kyi dbang du byas te de ni
T03D3796:34a-6: mdo de dang de las rnam pa du ma bstan

T03D3796:34a-21: don 'di las bsams te slob dpon zhi ba 'tsho'i zhal snga nas kyang /

T03D3796:34a-27: ji ltar snying po med mthong ba //

T03D3796:34a-29: gus pa shin tu skye bar 'gyur /
T03D3796:34a-31: tshogs kyi lam khyad par can gyi dbang du byas te /

T03D3796:34a-41: mtshan nyid dag kyang ma lus par shes par bya ba dang /
T03D3796:34a-42: skabs bzhi pa las rang gi ngo bo ji skad du bstan pas legs par bshad pa dang /
T03D3796:34b-2: thub pa'i dbang po'i byin gyi brlabs dang sbyar ba dag gis bstan te /
T03D3796:34b-3: de la ming tha dad pa'i don gyi dbang du

T03D3796:34b-5: / thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba zhes grags so //
T03D3796:34b-6: khyad par can du gzhag pa'i rgyu mtshan ni 'di
T03D3796:34b-7: ni ma nges pa'i phyir mi ldog pa zhes bya

T03D3796:34b-13: rtags kyi dbang du byas te ni tshe dang lus dang /
T03D3796:34b-15: byin gyi brlabs la dbang ba ste 'bras bu'i rtags so //

T03D3796:34b-17: thub pa'i dbang po'i byin gyi brlabs kyi dbang du byas te /

T03D3796:34b-19: pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag la goms
T03D3796:34b-21: de ltar na thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i dge

T03D3796:34b-34: mgu bar gyis la snying po blang bar byos shig

T03D3796:34b-36: gyi dam bcas pa bstan pa la sogs pa'i mdo

T03D3796:35a-6: du byas te ni byang chub sems dpa' rtag par

T03D3796:35a-20: lus dang srog la mi lta bar chos yongs su tshol ba dang /
T03D3796:35a-21: rnyed stobs dang bkur sti dang grags pa'i phyir ma yin gyi /
T03D3796:35a-22: 'gro ba thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa spang ba'i phyir chos yongs su tshol ba dang /
T03D3796:35a-23: bdag 'ba' zhig la phan pa'i phyir ma yin gyi //
T03D3796:35a-24: bdag dang gzhan dang 'gro ba thams cad la phan pa'i phyir chos yongs su tshol ba dang /
T03D3796:35a-25: chos kyi mdangs kyis ras chod bya ba'i phyir ma yin gyi //
T03D3796:35a-26: shes rab la 'jug pa'i phyir chos yongs su tshol ba dang /
T03D3796:35a-27: go ba lo ba la dga' ba'i phyir ma yin

T03D3796:35a-33: cad kyi the tshom bcad pa'i don du chos yongs

T03D3796:35b-1: bar chos yongs su tshol ba dang zhes bya ba

T03D3796:35b-11: bkur sti dang bsnyen bkur bya'o //

T03D3796:35b-13: dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la sems bskyed pa bcu po 'di dag bskyed par bya ste /
T03D3796:35b-15: 'di ltar rim gro bya ba'i sems dang /

T03D3796:35b-20: sogs pa la ji snyam yang mi byed pa'i sems
T03D3796:35b-21: dang / gcig tu nges pa'i sems dang /

T03D3796:35b-23: smon lam gcig pa'i sems dang /

T03D3796:35b-27: pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la sems bskyed pa

T03D3796:35b-30: tu thob par 'gyur te zhes pa la sogs pa'o
T03D3796:35b-31: rnams so // // de'i phyir rgyal ba bskyed ma las /
T03D3796:35b-32: chos smra ba dang nyan pa 'gal bar gyur pas
T03D3796:35b-33: bdud kyi las su 'gyur ba srog gi bar chad
T03D3796:35b-34: du 'gyur ba'i phyogs la sogs par 'gro ba'i dbang
T03D3796:35b-35: du byas pa'i tshe yang slob mas dge ba'i bshes
T03D3796:35b-36: gnyen gyi bka' ni mi 'gom gyi rang gi srog

T03D3796:35b-39: kyi 'phags pa nor bzangs me'i g-yang sa chen por
T03D3796:36a-1: bsgo ba'i gtam rgyud la yang sbyar bar bya'o //
T03D3796:36a-2: yang chos nyan pa des thun mong du bya ba'i chos bcu bzhi la gnas par bya ste /
T03D3796:36a-3: de dag ni ji skad du 'phags pa don rgyas pa'i mdo las /

T03D3796:36a-9: bsgo ba bzhin du mnyan pa dang /

T03D3796:36a-18: sems bsdus te mnyan pa dang /

T03D3796:36a-27: phal cher legs bsdams rtags kyi rgyu byed pas //

T03D3796:62b-29: pa gtsor brjod pa yin la /
T03D3796:62b-30: gzhan dag gis ni kun rdzob tu brjod pas phyogs

T03D3796:62b-32: stong pa nyid gnyis po dbu ma chen po las
T03D3796:62b-33: bstan pa ni re rer yung 'gog par ga la
T03D3796:62b-34: mdzad ces bya bar gnas so //
T03D3796:62b-35: stong pa nyid gsum pa ni gnas skabs gzhan du bstan to //

T03D3796:63a-22: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs la /

T03D3796:63a-33: sngar ji ltar thos pa la sogs pa byas pa'i
T03D3796:63a-34: skabs gsum nyid goms par byas pas ci zhig mi

T03D3796:63a-37: gzhi zhes pa bsdus pa'i sgo nas sgom par byed ces sbyar te /

T03D3796:63b-1: par byed pa'o // zad bsdus pa'o // bsgom pa'i
T03D3796:63b-2: shes rab ni don 'ba' zhig la dmigs pas shin

T03D3796:63b-7: rtse mo'i mngon par rtogs pa la sogs pa gsum

T03D3796:63b-14: gzhan dag thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gsum gyi re

T03D3796:63b-17: // mngon par zhen pa ni mngon du phyogs te'o //

T03D3796:63b-20: rtogs pas ni bsgoms pas khong du chud pa'o //

T03D3796:63b-22: rnam pa'i rang bzhin ci zhig yin /

T03D3796:63b-26: sogs pa smos pa ni bde ba dang /

T03D3796:63b-43: rnam pa zhes bya ba la /
T03D3796:64a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ye shes ni yon tan smos @64a * //
T03D3796:64a-1: pa'i sgo nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa zhes
T03D3796:64a-2: bya ba nas 'dir yang rnam pa zhes smos te

T03D3796:64a-4: de ltar rnam pa ni gsum zhes bstan nas /

T03D3796:64a-6: rnam pa nyid du gzhag pa ni mtshan nyid de zhes smos te /
T03D3796:64a-7: dang por re zhig sngar bstan pa ltar rnam pa

T03D3796:64a-29: pa zhi bas brten pa'i phyir ro //

T03D3796:64a-33: rnam pa sum cu rtsa bzhi po rnams ni theg

T03D3796:64a-35: pa'i phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyu'i rnam
T03D3796:64a-36: par gzhag gi dngos sun thams cad shes pa dang
T03D3796:64a-37: lam shes pa'i rnam par gong du drangs te brtsi'o
T03D3796:64a-38: zhes zer te / 'dir ni spyir mtshan gzhi dang mtshan nyid sbyar ba'o //
T03D3796:64a-39: thams cad shes pa'i skabs su nyan thos rnams kyi
T03D3796:64a-40: rnam pa bcu drug smos pa ni de dag gi

T03D3796:64b-3: nyid do // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i rnam
T03D3796:64b-4: pa brgya rtsa bcu ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i
T03D3796:64b-5: ye shes chen po gcig pu de'i mtshan nyid do

T03D3796:64b-7: cad shes pa'i rnam pa sum cu rtsa bdun ni
T03D3796:64b-8: tshogs kyi lam dang sbyor ba'i lam dang mthong ba'i
T03D3796:64b-9: lam gyi mtshan gzhi rnams kyi mtshan nyid do //
T03D3796:64b-10: lam shes pa'i rnam pa sum cu rtsa bzhi ni rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /
T03D3796:64b-11: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni
T03D3796:64b-12: mthong ba'i lam dang bsgom pa'i lam gyi mtshan nyid
T03D3796:64b-13: do // byang chub sems dpa' dag ni bden pa

T03D3796:64b-18: do // so // nyid do // sangs rgyas nyid kyi lam ni 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid do //
T03D3796:64b-19: lhag ma rnams ni sngon bzhin te /
T03D3796:64b-20: 'di ni mtshan nyid dang mtshan gzhi'i sgo nas rnam pa'i rang bzhin ni mtshan nyid du bstan pa'o //
T03D3796:64b-21: gal te rnam pa'i rang bzhin mtshan nyid yin na
T03D3796:64b-22: 'di dag bstan pa'i dgos pa ni ci zhig yin
T03D3796:64b-23: / 'og nas mtshan nyid dgu bcu rtsa gcig tu
T03D3796:64b-24: ston pa'i mtshan nyid rnams dang 'di la khyad par
T03D3796:64b-26: 'di bstan pa'i dgos pa ni dang por re zhig
T03D3796:64b-27: byang chub sems dpa' thos pa dang bsam pa'i shes
T03D3796:64b-28: rab dag la goms pa phul du phyin pas rgyal
T03D3796:64b-29: ba'i yum bsgom pa la sogs pa la yon tan
T03D3796:64b-30: bcu bzhi yod par shes par byas pas yid spro

T03D3796:64b-32: tan thob par 'dod pas skyon ji skad gsungs pa
T03D3796:64b-33: rnams ji ltar rigs par spangs te /
T03D3796:64b-34: de nas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gsum gyi mtshan
T03D3796:64b-35: nyid rnams shes par byas pas de dag las spang
T03D3796:64b-36: ba dang blang ba dang thob bar 'gyur bar yid

T03D3796:64b-38: dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de sbyor ba rnam pa

T03D3796:64b-42: par bya'o zhes bya ba'i rim pa 'dis ni rnam
T03D3796:65a-0: pa bstan pas ni mthong ba @65a * //

T03D3796:65a-3: 'og nas 'chad pa'i mtshan nyid ni rnam pa thams
T03D3796:65a-4: cad mkhyen pa nyid gsum gyi mtshan nyid ji lta
T03D3796:65a-5: bu yin pa tsam zhig ston gyi bsgom pa'i rim
T03D3796:65a-6: pa ni gtsor ma gyur pas khyad par ni yod

T03D3796:65a-10: dang por rim pa ni 'dir rnam pa ji snyed yod pa bstan la /
T03D3796:65a-11: 'og nas ni mtshan gzhi dang mtshan nyid du ston
T03D3796:65a-12: pas na bstan pa'i lugs tha dad pa'i khyad par
T03D3796:65a-13: yod ces kyang shes par bya'o //
T03D3796:65a-14: de ltar rang bzhin bstan nas da ni rnam pa de dag gang gis bzhag snyam pa la /
T03D3796:65a-15: ji ltar phye ba des gzhag gi 'di la rgyu mtshan gzhan ni med ces bstan pa'i phyir /
T03D3796:65a-16: de dag kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gsum gyi bye brag gis zhes bya ba smos te /
T03D3796:65a-17: gsum pa 'di ni rgyu mtshan ston par bya'o //
T03D3796:65a-18: de'i phyir rgyu mtshan des na rnam pa gsum kho nar bzhed do zhes bya ba smos te /
T03D3796:65a-19: 'dis ni grangs nges pa'i rgyu mtshan yang bstan par dgongs pa'o //
T03D3796:65a-20: med pa ni rtag pa'i rang bzhin med pas so //
T03D3796:65a-21: mi skye ba ni skad cig gcig las lhag par skye ba med pa ste /
T03D3796:65a-22: gang skye bas 'phel ba med pa ni byung ma
T03D3796:65a-23: thag tu 'jig pas na chu'i chu bur lta bu'o

T03D3796:65a-26: mi skye ba ni 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal skad cig re re 'jig pa'o //
T03D3796:65a-27: dben pa ni byed pa po dang gtsang ba la sogs pas so //
T03D3796:65a-28: mi brdzi ba ni bdag med pa'i phyir bdag gi med par rtogs pas mi brdzi ba ste /
T03D3796:65a-29: de bzhin du gzhan la yang ci rigs su shes par bya ste /
T03D3796:65a-30: tshig gi don rnams ni go sla bas rnam par ma phye'o //
T03D3796:65a-31: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bshad pa'i de bzhin nyid

T03D3796:65a-35: kha cig ni gdul bya dman pa dag rjes su
T03D3796:65b-0: @65b gzung ba'i phyir theg pa gsum gyis ston to
T03D3796:65b-1: // yang kha cig ni theg pa lngas ston pa ni gdul bya skrag pa spang ba'i phyir te /
T03D3796:65b-2: ji skad du 'phags pa sa'i snying po 'khor lo
T03D3796:65b-3: bcu pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo

T03D3796:65b-7: chad par lta la ngan song lhung 'gyur bas //

T03D3796:65b-28: rang byung gi ye shes so //
T03D3796:65b-29: de yang gnyis te chos kyi dbyings dang /
T03D3796:65b-30: srid pa tha ma pas thob pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes so //
T03D3796:65b-31: de la chos kyi dbyings kyi dbang du byas te /
T03D3796:65b-32: ji skad du 'phags pa sdong po bkod pa las /
T03D3796:65b-33: 'jig rten khams rnams la la dag / bsam gyis mi khyab tshig gyur kyang //
T03D3796:65b-35: rang byung ye shes de bzhin no //
T03D3796:65b-37: de ji ltar rang byung gi ye shes yin zhe na /
T03D3796:65b-38: rgyu dang rkyen gyi rnam pas ma byas pa'i phyir dang /

T03D3796:65b-40: gzhan dag ni rgyal ba'i yum las /

T03D3796:65b-42: ye shes kyang gang gi yul yang ma yin no //
T03D3796:66a-2: gal te ye shes la yul yod na mi shes par 'gyur ro //
T03D3796:66a-4: chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa de nyid ye shes su 'dod de /
T03D3796:66a-5: de ltar byas na shin tu 'dus chos lngas sangs
