T03D3796:95a-2: ngo bo nyid kyi sku zhes bya ba ni 'di
T03D3796:95a-3: ni ngo bo nyid kyang yin la sku yang yin
T03D3796:95a-4: pas na ngo bo nyid kyi sku zhes gzhi mthun
T03D3796:95a-5: pa'i bsdu ba'o // de la ngo bo nyid ni
T03D3796:95a-6: chos can khyad par can rnams kyi chos nyid khyad
T03D3796:95a-7: par can gang yin pa de 'dir ngo bo nyid
T03D3796:95a-8: pa'i bsdu ba'o // ces bya'o // chos can khyad
T03D3796:95a-9: par can rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi sa kun tu
T03D3796:95a-10: bzang po'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la sogs
T03D3796:95a-11: pa'i bsdu ba'o // ces bya'o // pa'o // de
T03D3796:95a-12: dag gi chos nyid khyad par can gang yin pa
T03D3796:95a-13: ni don dam pa'i bden pa gang la sems kyi
T03D3796:95a-14: rgyu ba yang med na yi ge rnams lta smos
T03D3796:95a-15: kyang ci dgos zhes bya ba ste /
T03D3796:95a-16: de'i phyir de bzhin nyid rnam par dag pa dang
T03D3796:95a-17: rnam par dag pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba
T03D3796:95a-18: ni chos can gyi dbang gis rnam par gzhag pa
T03D3796:95a-19: ma yin pa gzhan gyis ni cung zad kyang rnam
T03D3796:95a-20: par gzhag pa nus pa ma yin la //
T03D3796:95a-22: de'i chos nyid kyang de nyid dang gzhan nyid du brjod du med pa'o zhes sngar bstan to //
T03D3796:95a-23: de dag gi rang bzhin zhes bya ba'i rnam par
T03D3796:95a-24: 'grel pa ni de dag gi rang bzhin ni ngo
T03D3796:95a-25: bo nyid de zhes bya ba'o //
T03D3796:95a-26: mtshan nyid can zhes bya ba'i rnam par 'grel pa
T03D3796:95a-27: ni skye ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid 'di yin
T03D3796:95a-29: mtshan nyid ces bya ba ni rang bzhin de'i tha
T03D3796:95a-30: dad pa ma yin pa'i chos kyi khyad par 'ga'
T03D3796:95a-31: zhig la blos tha dad par gzung ba'i ngo bo
T03D3796:95a-32: nyid la bya ba'i phyir la 'dir ni tha dad
T03D3796:95a-33: pa ma yin pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid de yang
T03D3796:95a-34: skye ba med pa nyid la 'dod de /
T03D3796:95a-35: des na rang bzhin dang de'i mtshan nyid skye ba med pa ste /
T03D3796:95a-36: de las gzhan ma yin pa blos mtshon par bya ba dang /
T03D3796:95a-37: mtshon par byed pa tsam du btags pa'o //
T03D3796:95a-38: bcos ma ma yin pa'i don gyis zhes bya ba la /
T03D3796:95a-39: ngo bo nyid dang lhan cig skyes pa dang /
T03D3796:95a-40: ma bcos pa zhes bya ba ni ming gi rnam grangs te /
T03D3796:95a-41: de nyid kyi phyir chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis
T03D3796:95a-42: de ltar yin gyi sus kyang byas pa ma yin
T03D3796:95a-44: gsum pa 'di ni gtan tshigs su blta bar bya'o //
T03D3796:95a-45: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gyis 'thob kyi zhes
T03D3796:95a-46: bya ba ni sa rab tu dga' ba la sogs
T03D3796:95a-47: pa'i mnyam par gzhag pa'i shes pa sems rgyu ba
T03D3796:95b-0: med pa ni de thob pa ste de dang @95b
T03D3796:95b-1: dbyer med par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3796:95b-2: de'i rjes las thob pa yang de'i 'phen pa dang ma bral bas na thob pa zhes bya'o //
T03D3796:95b-3: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gyis thob pa nyid
T03D3796:95b-4: bstan pa ni rnam par shes pa sgyu ma lta
T03D3796:95b-5: bus chos thams cad rtogs pas thob pa yin no
T03D3796:95b-6: zhes smos te / rnam par shes pa ni thos
T03D3796:95b-7: pa dang bsam pa dang bsgom pa'i shes rab rnams
T03D3796:95b-8: zhes smos te / so // de nyid don dam
T03D3796:95b-9: par med du zin kyang kun rdzob tsam du don
T03D3796:95b-10: byed pa mi 'dor bas na sgyur ma lta bus
T03D3796:95b-12: chos thad cad ni chos kyi dbyings te /
T03D3796:95b-13: chos kyi dbyings las ma gtogs pa'i //
T03D3796:95b-14: 'di ltar chos yod ma yin te //
T03D3796:95b-16: thob pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T03D3796:95b-17: gzhan yang ngo bo nyid kyi sku thob pa ni //
T03D3796:95b-18: chu khams gser dang nam mkha' rnams //
T03D3796:95b-19: dag pa bzhin du dag par 'dod //
T03D3796:95b-20: ces gsungs pas bral ba'i sgo nas thob pa rnam par des par bzhag ste /
T03D3796:95b-21: nad med pa thob pa lta bu'i dpes so //
T03D3796:95b-22: chos can rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes ni
T03D3796:95b-23: rjes las thob pa'i ye shes kyis thob par rnam
T03D3796:95b-25: 'di ni de tsam gyi nges par gzhag par bya
T03D3796:95b-26: ba las rnam pa gzhan du mi nus pas so
T03D3796:95b-27: // 'di rnal 'byor gyi mngon sum du bsgrub pa'i tshul yang de nyid yin par zad do //
T03D3796:95b-28: chos can kun rdzob mkhyen pa rnams ni rang rig pa'i mngon sum gyis rnam par gzhag go //
T03D3796:95b-29: de nyid kyang rjes su dpag pa dang da ltar
T03D3796:95b-30: bas rnam par gzhag cing de yang da ltar ba'i
T03D3796:95b-31: mngon sum las 'brel pa thob pa'o //
T03D3796:95b-32: de dag gi rim par 'brel ba ni rgyu rnams
T03D3796:95b-33: bya ba byed pa'i rigs pa nyid yin pa'i phyir
T03D3796:95b-34: dang / 'bras bu rnams ltos pa'i rigs pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3796:95b-35: de dag gi ngo bo nyid la the tshom za
T03D3796:95b-36: ba ni chos nyid kyi rigs pas sel bar byed
T03D3796:95b-37: de / des na sangs rgyas kyi sa la nges
T03D3796:95b-38: par 'byed pa'i tshul ni rigs pa bzhi char gyis
T03D3796:95b-39: bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya bar gnas so //
T03D3796:95b-40: gzhan dag ni 'di ni lung gis bsgrub pa yin
T03D3796:95b-41: gyi rigs pa'i lam gyis bsgrub par mi bya'o zhes
T03D3796:95b-42: zer te de dag gis kyang legs par smras so
T03D3796:95b-43: // kha cig ni de mi 'dod de /
T03D3796:95b-44: lung ni rjes su dpag pa'i tshad mar 'dus pa'i
T03D3796:96a-0: phyir lung 'ba' zhig gis ji ltar chogs @96a *
T03D3796:96a-1: // med par 'jug par bya zhes zer ro //
T03D3796:96a-2: yang dag pa'i kun rdzob ces bya ba ni 'jig
T03D3796:96a-3: rten las 'das pa'i ye shes de'i rjes las thob
T03D3796:96a-4: pa'i snang ba nyid yin gyi gtsug lag kha cig
T03D3796:96a-5: la byis pa rnams kyi thun mong gi tha snyad
T03D3796:96a-6: la bstan pa ni 'dir mi bzung ngo //
T03D3796:96a-7: snang ba zhes bya ba ni snang ba tsam yin
T03D3796:96a-8: gyi de dag dngos por grub pa'i mthu can ni
T03D3796:96a-11: don dam par chos nyid kyi ngo bo'i zhes smos te /
T03D3796:96a-12: kun rdzob ni dngos po nyid du gzhag pa med do zhes sngar bstan pa'i tshul gyis te /
T03D3796:96a-13: dngos po zhes bya ba yang rigs pa dang ldan
T03D3796:96a-14: par don byed par nus pa'i rang bzhin yin na
T03D3796:96a-15: / gang dag kun rdzob pa de dag ni rigs
T03D3796:96a-16: pa'i sbungs mi bzod pas na de ltar ga la
T03D3796:96a-17: / zhig 'gyur / de'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi sa
T03D3796:96a-18: kun tu bzang po 'khrul pa'i dri ma mtha' dag
T03D3796:96a-19: ma lus par spangs pa las lus dang ngag gi
T03D3796:96a-20: bkod pa sems can dang sems can ma yin pas
T03D3796:96a-21: bsdus pa ji snyed cig snang ba de dag ni
T03D3796:96a-22: don dam par chos nyid kyi ngo bo de nyid
T03D3796:96a-23: gdul bya rnams la rang rang gi ji ltar mos
T03D3796:96a-24: pas rab tu phye ba nyid du snang ba'o //
T03D3796:96a-25: gdul bya de dag kyang gang zhe na /
T03D3796:96a-26: sangs rgyas rnams ni dang po ste de dag la
T03D3796:96a-27: ni chos kyi sku gnyis pa phan tshun du snang
T03D3796:96a-28: ngo // don dam pa'i sku dang po 'di de
T03D3796:96a-29: bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
T03D3796:96a-30: pa'i ye shes kyi yang yul ma yin te /
T03D3796:96a-31: de ni yul gyi rang bzhin gang du yang ma gyur pas so //
T03D3796:96a-32: chos kyi sku ste gnyis pa ni de dag gi
T03D3796:96a-33: ye shes kyi snang ba rab 'byam dag la lhun
T03D3796:96a-35: de la yang tha dad pa'i rtog pa mi 'byung ba'o //
T03D3796:96a-36: gdul bya gnyis pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams
T03D3796:96a-37: te de dag la ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku
T03D3796:96a-38: snang ste / byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu pa rnams 'ba' zhig la der snang ngo //
T03D3796:96a-39: gzhan dag ni sa brgyad pa nas bzung ste /
T03D3796:96a-41: yang gzhan dag ni smon lam dang bsod nams cher
T03D3796:96a-42: bsags pa'i mthu las thams cad la yang snang mod
T03D3796:96a-43: kyi / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas cha lugs
T03D3796:96a-44: la mngon par zhen pa'i rigs can de dag 'ba'
T03D3796:96a-45: zhig la snang bar mi 'gyur te /
T03D3796:96b-0: de'i phyir 'phags @96b pa theg pa chen po la dad pa rab tu bsgom pa'i mdo las /
T03D3796:96b-1: de'i 'khor du lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang
T03D3796:96b-2: mi'am ci la sogs pa bstan pa mdzad do zhes
T03D3796:96b-3: zer ro // de ni mi rigs te de dag
T03D3796:96b-4: gis ni sprul pa'i sku nyid la longs spyod rdzogs
T03D3796:96b-5: pa'o zhes mthong ba brtsan par byas pa'o //
T03D3796:96b-6: gdul bya dman pa ni nyan thos la sogs pa ste /
T03D3796:96b-7: de dag gi yul du ni sprul pa'i sku 'ba' zhig snang ngo //
T03D3796:96b-8: sogs pa zhes bya ba ni ma nges pa 'bras bu gang la yang ma zhugs pa dag la'o //
T03D3796:96b-9: de yang dro bar gyur pa thong ba na ni sprul pa'i sku rtag par mthong ba ste /
T03D3796:96b-10: sangs rgyas la sogs pa mthong ba dang zhes bstan pas so //
T03D3796:96b-11: drod la sogs pa ma thob kyang de lan 'ga' zhig mthong ba ni mi dgag go //
T03D3796:96b-12: sa rab tu dga' ba la sogs par ni chos
T03D3796:96b-13: can thams cad mthong ba las ngo bo nyid kyi
T03D3796:96b-14: sku mthong bar mos par byed de /
T03D3796:96b-15: der snang gzugs la sogs pa la //
T03D3796:96b-16: sangs rgyas nyid du nges 'dzin dang //
T03D3796:96b-18: tha mi dad kyang zhes bya ba ni rang gi rang bzhin gyi dbang du byas te'o //
T03D3796:96b-19: tha dad par rnam par gzhag go zhes bya ba
T03D3796:96b-20: ni de'i mthu'i bye brag gis tha dad pa ltar
T03D3796:96b-22: de'i phyir byis pa rnams la 'gal bar snang ba
T03D3796:96b-23: ji snyed cig 'gal ba ltar bur gnas kyang 'gal
T03D3796:96b-24: ba med pa ni chos kyi dbyings bsam gyis mi
T03D3796:96b-25: khyab pa'i phyir sun dbyung bar nus pa ma yin
T03D3796:96b-26: pas / gang du yang bden pa gnyis phan tshun
T03D3796:96b-27: 'gal bas gcig gis gcig sun dbyung bar ni mi
T03D3796:96b-28: pas / bya'o // rang gi rtog pas gnyi ga las 'gal bar mi bya'o //
T03D3796:96b-29: de'i phyir 'dir byis pa'i gnas skabs na ni yongs
T03D3796:96b-30: su ma dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings de sna tshogs
T03D3796:96b-31: su rnam par rtog pa la med bzhin du snang
T03D3796:96b-32: la / sangs rgyas kyi sa kun tu bzang po
T03D3796:96b-33: la ni yongs su dag pa'i de bzhin nyid de
T03D3796:96b-34: nyid sna tshogs su snang ba'o //
T03D3796:96b-35: de ltar ngo bo nyid kyi sku de nyid kyi dbang du byas te /
T03D3796:96b-36: 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas /
T03D3796:96b-37: gcig min du ma ma yin bdag dang gzhan la phan pa phun sum tshogs chen gzhir gyur pa //
T03D3796:96b-38: dngos med dngos po yod pa ma yin mkha' ltar ro gcig rtogs par dka' ba'i rang bzhin can //
T03D3796:97a-0: @97a * // spros pa med cing mi 'gyur zhi la mi mnyam pa'i khyab pa ca can de spros med pa //
T03D3796:97a-1: so so rang rig rgyal ba rnams kyi chos sku dpe med gang yin de la bdag phyag 'tshal //
T03D3796:97a-3: gzhan las kyang 'di'i mtshan nyid bstan pa /
T03D3796:97a-4: gsang ba pa'i bdag po chos kyi dbyings rnam par
T03D3796:97a-5: mi rtogs pa ji ltar dgos pa thams cad mngon
T03D3796:97a-7: gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'di lta ste /
T03D3796:97a-8: dper na nam mkha'i khams ni sems can yang ma yin /
T03D3796:97a-10: shed las skyes pa yang ma yin /
T03D3796:97a-11: byed pa po yang ma yin /
T03D3796:97a-12: tshor ba po yang ma yin /
T03D3796:97a-15: rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral mod kyi /
T03D3796:97a-16: 'on kyang sems can gyi khams ma lus pa rnams
T03D3796:97a-17: 'gro ba dang 'ong ba la sogs pa thams cad
T03D3796:97a-18: byed de 'di la ni dogs pa med do //
T03D3796:97a-19: de bzhin rnam par mi rtog pa'i //
T03D3796:97a-20: thams cad mkhyen pa gnas med 'di //
T03D3796:97a-21: 'gro ba rnams kyi phyi dang nang //
T03D3796:97a-22: tham cad nges pa nyid du sgrub //
T03D3796:97a-24: chos kyi sku zhes bya ba ni sku bzhir gzhag pa'i tshe na /
T03D3796:97a-25: chos can gyi sku ni chos kyi sku zhes bya ste /
T03D3796:97a-26: sngar ji skad du bstan pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi chos can ni 'di min pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3796:97a-27: gang gi tshe sku gsum du bstan pa de'i tshe
T03D3796:97a-28: ni chos nyid kyi sku zhes bsdus pa la btags
T03D3796:97a-29: pa ste / cho nyid ni chos can las tha dad par bzhag par mi nu pas so //
T03D3796:97a-30: spros pa med pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid ni sngar bstan pa nyid do //
T03D3796:97a-31: de ni spros pa med pa yang rnam pa du mar gnas par bstan pa'i phyir ;
T03D3796:97a-32: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la sogs pa'i ngo bo zhes bya ba smos te /
T03D3796:97a-33: sogs pa zhes bya ba ni tshad med pa la
T03D3796:97a-34: sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi chos brgya bzhi po rnams
T03D3796:97a-35: so // gal te de ltar rnam pa de snyed
T03D3796:97a-36: cig yod na ji ltar na spros pa med pa'i
T03D3796:97a-37: ye shes zhes bya zhe na /
T03D3796:97a-38: zag pa med pa zhes bya ba smos te /
T03D3796:97a-39: zag pa zhes bya ba yang kha cig tu ni nyon mongs pa la bya bar yang mthong ste /
T03D3796:97a-40: zag pa zad pa zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
T03D3796:97a-42: nyon mongs pa ched du ma spangs pa bag la
T03D3796:97a-43: nyal ba'i tshul lta bur sa bcu pa'i byang chub
T03D3796:97b-0: sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyud la yod pa cung @97b
T03D3796:97b-1: zad pa de sangs rgyas kyi sa la zad par
T03D3796:97b-2: byas pas so // kha cig tu ni zag pa
T03D3796:97b-3: zhes bya ba rnam par rtog pa la bya bar
T03D3796:97b-4: byas pas so // mthong ste / zag pa'i dbang
T03D3796:97b-5: gis de'i nyon mongs pa rnams skye ba ni zhes
T03D3796:97b-7: 'dir ni phyogs phyi ma 'di gtso bor bzung ste /
T03D3796:97b-8: rnam pa de snyed du zin kyang de la rtog
T03D3796:97b-9: pa med cing lhun gyis grub par 'jug pas na
T03D3796:97b-11: yang na bskal pa grangs med pa du ma zhig
T03D3796:97b-12: gi bar du dngos po rnams la don dam par
T03D3796:97b-13: 'dzin pas bden par 'dzin pa spang ba la rab
T03D3796:97b-14: tu goms par 'dzad pas snang ba rnams sgyu ma
T03D3796:97b-15: tsam du yongs su mkhyen pa'i phyir sgyu ma lta
T03D3796:97b-16: bu'i rnam par rtog pa mnga' yang 'di la nyes
T03D3796:97b-17: pa med de / don 'di nyid thugs la bzhag nas /
T03D3796:97b-18: sems can gyi ni don mdzad thabs //
T03D3796:97b-19: rnam rtog ye shes mnga' ba na //
T03D3796:97b-20: de yis kun mkhyen rtsom ba ni //
T03D3796:97b-21: de don yin phyir nyes pa med //
T03D3796:97b-23: bden par 'dzin pa'i dbang gis skyon //
T03D3796:97b-24: chags dang zhe sdang la sogs pa //
T03D3796:97b-25: dgra rnams rang byung de log na //
T03D3796:97b-28: de'i phyir rang gi rnam par rtog pa bden par
T03D3796:97b-29: 'dzin pa nyid bcom pa la gcig tu 'bad par
T03D3796:97b-30: bya'i / sgyu ma la sogs pa ltar gnas pa'i
T03D3796:97b-31: tha snyad rnams kyis ni shin tu 'jigs par mi
T03D3796:97b-32: bya'i / bya ste / don 'di las dgongs nas 'phags pa lang kar gshegs pa las /
T03D3796:97b-33: 'ching ba'i rgyu ni yul ma yin //
T03D3796:97b-35: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis ni rim
T03D3796:97b-36: pa bzhin du sku ring bsrel du bshig pa na
T03D3796:97b-37: mi dgyes pa mi mnga' ba dang /
T03D3796:97b-38: tshor ba thams cad kyis mi 'phros pa dang /
T03D3796:97b-39: thugs yul rnams la mi rgyu ba dang /
T03D3796:97b-40: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid las mi 'da' ba'i phrin las rnam mdzad do //
T03D3796:97b-41: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis ni dge ba'i chos rnams las mi nyams pa dang /
T03D3796:97b-42: de'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs dag gis nyid kyi rgyud
T03D3796:97b-43: la yongs su mi gos pa'i phrin las 'dzad do
T03D3796:97b-44: // rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis ni mi
T03D3796:97b-45: stegs kyi gtso bo rnams gdul ba la sogs pa'i
T03D3796:97b-46: rgol ba tshar gcad pa dang gzhan 'dun par mdzad
T03D3796:98a-0: // do // dbang po rnams kyis ni dge ba @98a * //
T03D3796:98a-1: rnams la bzhed pa bzhin sbyor ba la thogs pa med par mdzad do //
T03D3796:98a-2: stobs rnams kyis ni dge ba rnams la sbyor ba dang /
T03D3796:98a-3: nang du yang dag par 'jog pa la sogs pa
T03D3796:98a-4: dag la bar chad kyi chos gang gis kyang brdzi
T03D3796:98a-5: bar mi nus par mdzad do //
T03D3796:98a-6: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis ni mngon par
T03D3796:98a-7: byang chub pa mdzad pa la nyid kyi rgyud gzhan
T03D3796:98a-8: du thabs kyis grogs btsal ba la rag lus pa
T03D3796:98a-9: med cing rang byung gi ye shes brnyes par mdzad
T03D3796:98a-10: do // 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rnams
T03D3796:98a-11: kyis ni ma 'dres pa'i lam la brten pas sgyu
T03D3796:98a-12: rtsal shes kyi bu ring du 'phur la sogs pa'i
T03D3796:98a-13: slob ma'i rim pas byang chub par gyur pa ma
T03D3796:98a-14: yin gyi rang gi lugs kyi lam bzang po la
T03D3796:98a-15: brten dgos pa'i phrin las mdzad do //
T03D3796:98a-16: 'di dag ni mdor bsdus na byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi las brjod pa ste /
T03D3796:98a-17: rgyas par so so'i las re rer ci rigs su sbyar te ;
T03D3796:98a-18: rgyas par ni 'phags pa rgya cher rol pa'i mdo las shes par bya'o //
T03D3796:98a-19: tshad med pa rnams kyis ni 'gro ba la thugs
T03D3796:98a-20: brtse ba la zhugs pas bsod nams kyi tshogs yongs
T03D3796:98a-22: mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyang spong ngo //
T03D3796:98a-23: 'gro ba rnams yongs su smin par mdzad pa la yongs su mi skyo ba'o //
T03D3796:98a-24: rnam par thar pa rnams las dang po gnyis kyis
T03D3796:98a-25: ni sprul pa'i las mngon par grub par byed cing
T03D3796:98a-26: / gsum pas ni sdug par sprul nas kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur bar byed de /
T03D3796:98a-27: lhag ma bzhis ni zhi ba'i rnam par thar pa rnams la mi chags so //
T03D3796:98a-28: tha mas ni mos pa'i dbang gis 'phags pa'i gnas
T03D3796:98a-29: pa dam pa shin tu zhi bar gnas pas gnas
T03D3796:98a-30: so // mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
T03D3796:98a-31: rnams kyis ni dang po bzhis ni 'dod pa'i khams
T03D3796:98a-32: kyi bde ba rnams la ma chags pas shing 'dzam
T03D3796:98a-33: bu'i grib ma la brten pas lha rnam 'dul ba
T03D3796:98a-34: so // dang ; btsun mo'i 'khor bsten kyang 'dod
T03D3796:98a-35: pa'i bde bas ma gos par ston cing 'bras s'a
T03D3796:98a-36: lu'i chan dang sman mar dge ba chen po la
T03D3796:98a-38: khams kyi zas la chags pa med par mdzad do //
T03D3796:98a-39: lhag ma bzhis ni gzugs med par skyes pa'i lha'i
T03D3796:98b-0: bu rnams skal ba mnyam zhing @98b rigs mthun pa'i
T03D3796:98b-2: de nas gzugs med pa'i lha'i bu de dag me
T03D3796:98b-3: tog sna tshogs lag na thogs te zhes bya ba
T03D3796:98b-4: la sogs pa shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo de dang
T03D3796:98b-5: de las bstan pa lta bu'o //
T03D3796:98b-6: tha mas ni 'phags pa nyan thos rnams kyis 'gog
T03D3796:98b-7: pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las khyad par du ston
T03D3796:98b-8: te / de dag ni zhag bdun du yang gnas pa'i mthu med la /
T03D3796:98b-9: bcom ldan 'das ni bzhed na bskal pa'i bar du 'ang de la gnas pas so //
T03D3796:98b-10: zad par gyi skye mched rnams kyis ni zad pa
T03D3796:98b-11: rgyas par mdzad pa'i ched du rnam par thar pa'i
T03D3796:98b-12: dmigs pa yongs su bsgrub par mdzad do //
T03D3796:98b-13: zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched rnams kyis ni dmigs
T03D3796:98b-14: pa tha dad par rtogs pa zil gyis gnon pa'i
T03D3796:98b-15: phyir rnam par gsum po rnams dmigs pa la dbang
T03D3796:98b-17: nyon mongs pa med pas ni bka' lung gzung bar bya bar mdzad do //
T03D3796:98b-18: smon gnas mkhyen pas ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs
T03D3796:98b-19: pa dang da ltar byung ba'i dngos po rnams lung
T03D3796:98b-20: ston pas gzhan la phan 'dogs pa dang //
T03D3796:98b-21: rgyu mtshan des 'jig rten na mang pos bkur bar bya bar 'gyur ro /
T03D3796:98b-22: mngon par shes pa rnams kyis ni bdag dang gzhan
T03D3796:98b-23: gyi rgyud kyis bsdus pa'i shes bya mkhyen par bya
T03D3796:98b-24: ba la thogs pa med cing de yang lus kyi
T03D3796:98b-25: las kyis bstan pa la 'dun par mdzad do //
T03D3796:98b-26: ngag gi las kyis kyang 'dun par 'dzad do //
T03D3796:98b-27: sems kyis kun tu brjod pas kyang 'dun par mdzad do //
T03D3796:98b-28: bstan pas sems can rnams tshim par mdzad do //
T03D3796:98b-29: sems can rnams kyi spyod pa dang 'ong ba dang
T03D3796:98b-30: 'gro ba mkhyen nas sems can rnams nges par 'byung
T03D3796:98b-31: ba la ji ltar bar 'doms pa ste /
T03D3796:98b-32: des kyang gdul bya myur du grol bar mdzad do //
T03D3796:98b-33: so so yang da par rig pa rnams kyis ni
T03D3796:98b-34: chos bstan pa thogs pa med pa rnam pa sna
T03D3796:98b-35: tshogs pas gdul bya rnams kyi sems tshim par mdzad
T03D3796:98b-36: de / chos kyi tshig kun mngon par mkhyen //
T03D3796:98b-37: don rnams kun gyi tshul la mkhas //
T03D3796:98b-38: skad kun rnam par 'byed pa mkhyen //
T03D3796:98b-39: phyogs rnams kun tu yongs dag ldan //
T03D3796:98b-41: yongs su dag pa rnams kyis ni srid pa rnams
T03D3796:98b-42: kyis ni srid pa rnams su kye ba bsams bzhin
T03D3796:99a-0: du @99a * // 'dzin cing bzhed par gyur na bskal pa mang por bzhugs te /
T03D3796:99a-1: ji skad du 'phags pa snying rje chen po padma
T03D3796:99a-2: dkar po'i mdo las ji skad gsungs pa lta bu'o
T03D3796:99a-3: // yang bzhed na de tshe'i 'du byed gtong ngo //
T03D3796:99a-4: yang chos la mnga' bsgyur zhing ting nge 'dzin la
T03D3796:99a-5: mnga' bsgyur te dam pa'i chos kyang rab tu 'dzin
T03D3796:99a-6: to // dbang rnams kyis ni pha rol tu phyin
T03D3796:99a-7: pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par ston pa'i 'bras bu'i
T03D3796:99a-8: che ba gzhan las so sor rig par mdzad do
T03D3796:99a-9: to // // dbang po gsum ni sbyin pa'i 'bras bu'o //
T03D3796:99a-10: de'i 'og ma gnyis ni tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu'o //
T03D3796:99a-11: de'i 'og ma ni bzod pa'i 'bras bu'o //
T03D3796:99a-12: de'i 'og ma ni brtson 'grus kyi 'bras bu'o //
T03D3796:99a-13: de'i 'og ma ni bsam gtan gyi 'bras bu'o //
T03D3796:99a-14: de'i 'og ma gnyis ni shes rab kyi 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3796:99a-15: stobs rnams kyis ni rgyu med par smra ba dang /
T03D3796:99a-16: mi mthun pa'i rgyur smra ba dang /
T03D3796:99a-17: rang gis byas pa ma yin pa dang /
T03D3796:99a-18: chad par smra ba bsal nas yang dag par mngon par mtho pa'i lam ston to //
T03D3796:99a-19: sems can rnams kyi sems kyi spyod pa dang /
T03D3796:99a-20: bstan pa bzhag pa'i snod dang /
T03D3796:99a-26: nges par 'byung ba yang dag par rjes su rtogs
T03D3796:99a-27: nas nges par legs pa'i lam ji lta ba bzhin
T03D3796:99a-28: du ston te / bdud thams cad kyang tshar gcod do //
T03D3796:99a-29: thams cad du zhu ba zhus pa yang lung ston to //
T03D3796:99a-30: mi 'jigs pa rnams kyis ni 'khor gyi nang du
T03D3796:99a-31: bdag yang dag pa'i ston pa yin par rab tu
T03D3796:99a-32: 'jog pa dang / mu stegs can gzhan rgol ba rnams tshar gcod par mdzad do //
T03D3796:99a-33: bsrung ba med pa rnams kyis ni slob ma'i tshogs la rtag tu gdams par mdzad do //
T03D3796:99a-34: yang dag par rjes su yang ston to //
T03D3796:99a-35: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis ni kun
T03D3796:99a-36: nas nyon mongs pa ni mnga' bar tshogs yongs su
T03D3796:99a-37: sdud do // bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid
T03D3796:99a-38: kyis ni sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa yal bar mi
T03D3796:99a-39: sdud do // 'dor te / rgya mtsho chu srin chen po'i gnas //
T03D3796:99a-40: dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur srid kyi //
T03D3796:99a-41: gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la //
T03D3796:99a-42: sangs rgyas dus la yol mi mnga' //
T03D3796:99a-43: zhes bstan pa'i tshul gyis so //
T03D3796:99b-0: bag chags yang dag par @99b bcom pas ni nyon
T03D3796:99b-1: mongs pa mi mnga' bas na nyon mongs pa lta
T03D3796:99b-2: bu'i spyod pa ni ston to //
T03D3796:99b-3: thugs rje chen pos ni lhun gyis grub pas rtag
T03D3796:99b-4: tu ye shes kyi snang bas 'jig rten la gzigs
T03D3796:99b-5: te / skad cig tsam yang mi gzigs par mi 'gyur ro //
T03D3796:99b-6: gzhan dag ni 'di ni bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i
T03D3796:99b-7: chos nyid yin te nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum
T03D3796:99b-8: du rtag tu gzigs pa ni thugs rje chen po
T03D3796:99b-9: ste / de ltar bshad na mdo'i don dang yang mthun la /
T03D3796:99b-10: mdo sde'i rgyan gyi tshig le'ur byas pa yang legs par drangs par 'gyur ro zhes zer ro //
T03D3796:99b-11: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi ni
T03D3796:99b-12: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi phrin las yongs su
T03D3796:99b-13: dag pa dang / rnyed pa dang /
T03D3796:99b-15: bzhugs pas kyang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis gnon to //
T03D3796:99b-16: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis ni sems
T03D3796:99b-17: can thams cad kyi the tshom gcod cing chos kyi
T03D3796:99b-18: tshul yang yin ring du 'jog ste /
T03D3796:99b-19: des sems can yongs su ma smin pa rnams ni yongs su smin par mdzad do //
T03D3796:99b-20: yongs su smin pa rnams ni rnam par grol bar mdzad do //
T03D3796:99b-21: lam shes pa nyid la sogs pa sngar bshad pa dag kyang yin no zhes bya ba ni /
T03D3796:99b-22: sngar nyan thos kyi mthong ba'i lam gyi yon tan dang /
T03D3796:99b-23: rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi sgra med par chos ston
T03D3796:99b-24: pa la sogs pa yon tan de dag kyang sangs
T03D3796:99b-25: rgyas kyi rgyud la mnga' ste /
T03D3796:99b-26: sngar dge slong dag nga lan stong du nyan thos
T03D3796:99b-27: kyi mya ngan las 'da' bas yongs su mya ngan
T03D3796:99b-28: las 'das so zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshul
T03D3796:99b-29: bstan pas so ; / de dag kyang sangs rgyas
T03D3796:99b-30: kyi rgyud kyis bsdus pa na chos kyi sku ye
T03D3796:99b-31: shes kyi rnam par brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba'i
T03D3796:99b-32: bstan pas so ; don te / de dag gi
T03D3796:99b-33: las kyang sangs rgyas mi 'byung ba'i dus su gdul
T03D3796:99b-34: bya smin par mdzad pa dang /
T03D3796:99b-35: theg pa dman pa la dad pa dag nyan thos
T03D3796:99b-36: su lung ston pa la sogs pas theg pa chen
T03D3796:99b-37: po la 'jug par mdzad do zhes bya ba la
T03D3796:99b-38: sogs pa ci rigs par sbyar ro //
T03D3796:99b-39: de dag ni chos de dag gi phrin las so so ba'o //
T03D3796:99b-40: chos de dag gi rang gi ngo bo rnams ni mdo'i tshig gis go bar nus te /
T03D3796:99b-41: chung zad du rnam par thar pa rnams kyis ni
T03D3796:100a-0: dang po sems yongs su sbyong bar rtsom bar @100a
T03D3796:100a-2: de nas zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched rnams kyis ni legs par sbyong bar byed la /
T03D3796:100a-3: de'i rjes la zad par gyi skye mched rnams kyis
T03D3796:100a-4: ni de yongs su grub par shes par bya ste
T03D3796:100a-5: / de nyid kyis na sngar rnam pa'i skabs su
T03D3796:100a-6: byang chub sems dpa'i lam la gtso bo rnam par
T03D3796:100a-7: thar pa brgyad smos pas lhag ma rnams bsdus par
T03D3796:100a-8: / shes par bya'o // dbang rnam pa bcu'i dbang du byas te /
T03D3796:100a-9: bskal pa brjod du med par tshe'i tshad byin gyis brlabs pas tshe la dbang ba dang /
T03D3796:100a-10: ting nge 'dzin grangs med pa la nges par rtog
T03D3796:100a-11: par 'jog cing ye shes kyi 'jug pa'i tshul gyis
T03D3796:100a-13: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rgyan rnam par
T03D3796:100a-14: dbye ba du mas brgyan par byin gyi rlabs pa
T03D3796:100a-15: ston pa'i tshul gyis yo byad la dbang ba dang
T03D3796:100a-16: / dus ji lta ba bzhin du las kyi rnam
T03D3796:100a-17: par smin par byin gyis brlabs pas las la dbang
T03D3796:100a-18: / ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
T03D3796:100a-19: du skye ba ston pas skye ba la dbang ba
T03D3796:100a-20: / ba dang / dang / 'jig rten gyi khams
T03D3796:100a-21: thams cad sangs rgyas kyis gang bar blta bas mos
T03D3796:100a-23: dus dang zhing gang du 'dod par mngon par 'tshang rgya bas smon lam la dbang ba dang /
T03D3796:100a-24: rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad yongs su ston pas rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba dang /
T03D3796:100a-25: chos kyi sgo snang ba mtha' dang dbung med par
T03D3796:100a-26: yang dag par ston pas chos la dbang ba dang
T03D3796:100a-27: / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang mi bsnyengs
T03D3796:100a-28: pa skad cig skad cig tu go bar yongs su
T03D3796:100a-29: ston pas ye shes la dbang ba'o zhes 'phags pa
T03D3796:100a-30: sdong po bkod pa las gsungs pa rnams 'dir bkod
T03D3796:100a-31: / pa'o // chos kyi sku mngon par brjod do
T03D3796:100a-32: zhes zer ro zhes bya ba'i mngon par 'dod pa
T03D3796:100a-33: dang po 'di ni ngo bo nyid kyi sku dang
T03D3796:100a-34: chos kyi sku gnyis gcig tu 'dod pas gnyis su
T03D3796:100a-35: mi dbye'o zhes ston par byed pa slob dpon ye
T03D3796:100a-36: shes zla ba la sogs pa'i grub pa'i mtha'o //
T03D3796:100a-37: gzhan dag ni tshig le'ur byas pa la 'jug par
T03D3796:100a-38: byed do zhes bya ba 'di ni sngar slob dpon
T03D3796:100a-39: nyid kyis ji ltar bshad pa kho na yang bsdus
T03D3796:100a-41: mkhan po yang dag rnam par snang mdzad kyi bzhed pa'o //
T03D3796:100a-42: gzhan dag na re de dag gi ltar na zhes
T03D3796:100b-0: bya ba la sogs @100b ba'i bstan pa gsum pa
T03D3796:100b-1: 'di ni 'di snyam du gal te de ltar ngo
T03D3796:100b-2: bo nyid kyi sku dang chos kyi sku ni chos
T03D3796:100b-4: de dag kyang dbyer med na rnam pa thams cad
T03D3796:100b-5: du spros pa dang bral ba'i ngo bo gyur pas
T03D3796:100b-6: sems dang / sems las byung ba rnams gnas yongs
T03D3796:100b-7: su gyur pa'i ye shes gzung ba dang 'dzin pa
T03D3796:100b-8: gnyis su med pa sgyu ma tsam du snang ba'i
T03D3796:100b-9: ngo bos 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa rnams med par
T03D3796:100b-10: sems dang / 'gyur te / de dag yod na
T03D3796:100b-11: ni yang ngo bo nyid kyi sku med par 'gyur
T03D3796:100b-12: bas de'i phyir ngo bo nyid kyi sku ni mi
T03D3796:100b-13: brjod do zhes bsams nas ye shes kyi sku dang
T03D3796:100b-14: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang /
T03D3796:100b-15: sprul pa'i sku gsum du 'jog cing de dag thams
T03D3796:100b-16: cad kyang don dam par ma skyes par brjod kyi
T03D3796:100b-17: / ma skyes pa de sku gcig tu ga la zhig gzhag ces 'dod pa'o //
T03D3796:100b-18: kha cig na re sku gsum kho na'o zhes zer
T03D3796:100b-19: ro zhes bya ba mngon par 'dod pa bzhi pa
T03D3796:100b-20: 'di ni sku ni gsum kho na zhig yin la
T03D3796:100b-21: / de yang ngo bo nyid kyi sku dang /
T03D3796:100b-23: sprul pa'i sku dag tu 'dod pas /
T03D3796:100b-24: chos kyi sku ni ngo bo nyid kyi sku'i ming gi rnam grangs su 'dod pa ste /
T03D3796:100b-25: de'i phyir sangs rgyas kyis kun tu bzang po de
T03D3796:100b-26: la ni chos kyi dbyings ltar ye shes rang bzhin
T03D3796:100b-27: gyis 'od gsal ba de tsam zhig la sngon gyi
T03D3796:100b-28: smon lam gyi mthus gdul bya rnams la /
T03D3796:100b-29: byang chub phyogs mthun tshad med dang //
T03D3796:100b-30: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i yon tan rnams dang ldan par snang ba skyes pa yin gyi /
T03D3796:100b-31: rang bzhin ni de lta bu ma yin te /
T03D3796:100b-32: de'i phyir na de'i snang ba longs spyod rdzogs pa dang /
T03D3796:100b-33: skul ba yang de nyid kyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi mthu'i shugs kyis snang bas na /
T03D3796:100b-34: dngos su ni thub pa chen po la ni sku gcig tu zad pas na /
T03D3796:100b-35: 'phags pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i le'u las /
T03D3796:100b-36: rgyal bas chos nyid lus med rab zhi ba //
T03D3796:100b-37: gnyis med rang bzhin med pa thugs chud nas //
T03D3796:100b-38: gzugs sku bzang po mtshan gyis brgyan pa yis //
T03D3796:100b-39: 'gro ba ma lus bkang zhing ston par mdzad //
T03D3796:100b-40: ces gsungs so zhes brjod cing /
T03D3796:100b-41: tshul de lta bus byis pa rnams kyi dbang du
T03D3796:100b-42: sku gcig po de nyid sku gsum du bstan to
T03D3796:100b-43: zhes 'dod pa'o // tshig le'ur byas pa las ngo
T03D3796:100b-44: bo nyid ces bya ba'i sgra'i mjug thogs su chos
T03D3796:101a-1: bya ba'i sgra mi 'byung bas zhes bya ba'i tshig
T03D3796:101a-2: 'di ni de'i rigs pa ston pa ste /
T03D3796:101a-3: gal te sku bzhi pa yin na de'i tshe tshig
T03D3796:101a-4: le'ur byas pa'i nang du ngo bo nyid kyi sku'i
T03D3796:101a-5: 'og nyid du 'brel par chos kyi sku smos par
T03D3796:101a-8: rnam pa bzhir ni yang dag brjod //
T03D3796:101a-9: ces bya ba la bzhi ni phrin las dang bzhi zhes 'dod par byed do //
T03D3796:101a-10: gzhan dag na re zhes bya ba mngon par 'dod
T03D3796:101a-11: pa bzhi pa 'di ni sngar sku bzhir 'dod par
T03D3796:101a-12: smra ba rnams kyi lan btab pa ste /
T03D3796:101a-13: ngo bo nyid ces bya ba'i sgra'i mjug thogs su
T03D3796:101a-14: chos kyi sku zhes bya ba'i sgra smos pa ni
T03D3796:101a-15: / tshig le'ur byas pa sbyar ba'i ngor ni ye
T03D3796:101a-16: shes kho na dang mdzad par sbyar ba'i phyir dgos
T03D3796:101a-17: pa nye bar bstan pa'i shugs kyis de skad gsungs
T03D3796:101a-18: / pa yin te / de'i phyir de ni sku
T03D3796:101a-19: gsum du bzhag pa'i rgyu mtshan du mi rung ngo
T03D3796:101a-20: zhes bya ba ni bsdus pa'i don no //
T03D3796:101a-21: de ltar mdzad pa rnams ni chos kyi sku'i phrin las zhes btags kyang /
T03D3796:101a-22: bskal pa'i bar du sku thams cad kyis brgyud pa dang dngos su mdzad pas na /
T03D3796:101a-23: sku thams cad kyi mjug tu bstan par rigs pas de ltar bstan la /
T03D3796:101a-24: mdzad pa nyid shu rtsa bdun po de dag sprul
T03D3796:101a-25: pa'i sku'i rjes kho nar 'byung bas de dag gis
T03D3796:101a-26: ni sprul pa'i sku'i phrin las yin pa lta zhig
T03D3796:101a-27: ces kha cig sems pa la /
T03D3796:101a-28: sngar chos kyi sku'i gdags pa ni ma mdzad la /
T03D3796:101a-29: sku de ni grub pa'i mtha' thams cad la grags
T03D3796:101a-30: pas 'dir yang ston par rigs pas de ltar na
T03D3796:101a-32: des na las kyi byed pa po bstan te las
T03D3796:101a-33: dang byed pa po ni sku'i phrin las yin zhes
T03D3796:101a-34: rtogs par bya ba'i phyir tshig le'ur byas pa'i ngo
T03D3796:101a-35: bo nyid kyi sku'i mjug thogs su chos kyi sku
T03D3796:101a-37: de ltar de ni dgos pa nye bar ston pa'i shugs zhes bya'o //
T03D3796:101a-38: ye shes kho na zhes bya ba ni /
T03D3796:101a-39: byang chub phyogs mthun tshad med dang //
T03D3796:101a-40: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ji skad bshad pa rnams te /
T03D3796:101a-41: de dang mdzad pa chos kyi sku'i phrin las nyi
T03D3796:101a-42: shu rtsa bdun du sbyar ba ni byed pa po
T03D3796:101a-43: dang de'i las su sbyar ro //
T03D3796:101a-44: 'o na ye shes rnams sprul pa'i sku'i rjes su ci'i phyir mi bstan zhe na /
T03D3796:101a-45: de ni sku rnams gtso bo'i rim gyis bstan par rigs pa'i phyir dang /
T03D3796:101b-0: ngo bo nyid dang ye shes @101b rnams chos nyid
T03D3796:101b-1: dang chos can du bstan pa'i 'brel pa bsgrub pa'i
T03D3796:101b-2: phyir ro // yang kha cig ni longs spyod rdzogs
T03D3796:101b-3: pa'i sku la mngon par byang chub pa sa bcu
T03D3796:101b-4: pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'ba' zhig gi snang
T03D3796:101b-5: pa'i lam du gyur pa longs spyod rdzogs pa chen
T03D3796:101b-6: po'i sku ji skad bshad pa'i ye shes rnams kyi
T03D3796:101b-8: sa rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa la gnas
T03D3796:101b-9: pa'i snang ba'i lam du gyur pa sprul pa'i sku
T03D3796:101b-10: la longs spyod rdzogs par btags pa dang /
T03D3796:101b-11: sprul pa'i sku ste sku lngar 'dod do //
T03D3796:101b-12: gzhan dag ni sprul pa'i sku la rnam par smin
T03D3796:101b-13: pa dang rnam par smin pa ma yin pa'i dbye
T03D3796:101b-14: bas sku lngar ston par byed do //
T03D3796:101b-15: lhag ma rnams ni go sla bas rnam par ma phye'o //
T03D3796:101b-16: mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po 'bar ba zhes bya
T03D3796:101b-17: ba la 'di dag gis skyes bu chen por mtshon
T03D3796:101b-18: par byed pas na mtshan de 'og nas 'chad pa'i
T03D3796:101b-20: 'di dag gis gzhan gyi rgyud la rnam par sgo bar byed pas na dpe byad bzang po ste /
T03D3796:101b-21: 'dir aa nu bya nydza na'i spra'i don ni pha
T03D3796:101b-22: rol po'i rgyud la thub pa chen po'i sku'i mdzes
T03D3796:101b-23: pa nyid kyi rnam par bsgo zhing zhen par byed
T03D3796:101b-24: pa'i don te / de bas na mtshan dang dpe
T03D3796:101b-25: byad rnams kyi phyin las ni skyes bu chen por
T03D3796:101b-26: pa'i don te / byed pa dang / gdul bya rab tu 'dun par byed pa'o //
T03D3796:101b-27: de la mtshan rnams ni gtso bor gyur pas re
T03D3796:101b-28: re yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug drug gi
T03D3796:101b-29: rgyu las byung bar bstan te /
T03D3796:101b-30: ji skad du smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu ba mo
T03D3796:101b-31: dang dung dang mi tog kun da ltar dkar ba
T03D3796:101b-33: g-yas su 'khyil ba ni tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu'o ;
T03D3796:101b-34: / dpa' zhing zil gyis mi gnon pa ni bzod pa'i 'bras bu'o //
T03D3796:101b-35: ring bar gnas pa ni brtson 'grus kyi 'bras bu'o //
T03D3796:101b-36: shin tu 'khyil zhing legs par gnas pa ni bsam gtan gyi 'bras bu'o //
T03D3796:101b-37: 'od mtha' yas pas khyab pa ni shes rab kyi
T03D3796:101b-38: 'bras bu'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste rgyas
T03D3796:101b-39: par ni 'phags pa bskal ba bzang po zhes bya
T03D3796:101b-40: ba theg pa chen po'i mdo las shes par bya'o
T03D3796:101b-41: // dpe byad rnams ni 'khor du gyur pas na
T03D3796:101b-42: de ltar bstan pa med de gtso bos bsdus pa'i
T03D3796:101b-43: // phyir ro // ji ltar na gtso bo dang 'khor du bstan zhe na /
T03D3796:101b-44: sen mo zangs kyi mdog lta bu dang /
T03D3796:102a-3: sor mo rnams zlum pa dang /
T03D3796:102a-4: sor mo rnams rgyas pa dang /
T03D3796:102a-5: sor mo rnams byin gyis phra ba ste /
T03D3796:102a-6: dpe byang bzang po 'di drug ni mtshan phyag gi sor mo ring ba'i 'khor du gyur pa'i //
T03D3796:102a-7: dbu gdugs lta bur rgyas pa dang ;
T03D3796:102a-8: dbu skra bung ba ltar gnag pa dang /
T03D3796:102a-12: dbu skra mi bshor ba dang /
T03D3796:102a-13: dbu skra dri zhim pa ste /
T03D3796:102a-14: 'di dag ni dbu gtsug tor dang ldan pa dang /
T03D3796:102a-15: spu re re nas g-yas phyogs su 'khyil ba'i 'khor du gyur pa'o //
T03D3796:102a-16: dpral ba legs par 'byes pa dang /
T03D3796:102a-21: smin ma'i spu mnyam pa dang /
T03D3796:102a-24: 'di dag ni mdzod spu'i 'khor du gyur pa'o //
T03D3796:102a-26: spyan mdzes par 'dzum pa lta bu dang /
T03D3796:102a-30: 'di rnams ni spyan mthon mthing dang /
T03D3796:102a-31: spyan gyi rdzi ma ba'i rdzi ma lta bu'i 'khor du gyur pa'o //
T03D3796:102a-34: 'di dag ni 'gram pa seng ge lta bu'i 'khor du gyur pa'o //
T03D3796:102a-35: zhal lha cang mi ring ba dang /
T03D3796:102a-36: sgros shing thog bem pa ltar dmar ba dang /
T03D3796:102a-47: mche ba byin gyis phra ba ste /
T03D3796:102a-48: 'di rnams ni ljags yangs pa dang /
T03D3796:102a-52: tshems bzhi bcu mnga' ba dang /
T03D3796:102a-54: ro bro ba'i mchog brnyes pa rnams kyi 'khor du gyur pa ste /
T03D3796:102a-57: rtsa mdud ba med pa dang /
T03D3796:102a-58: long bu mi mngon pa dag dang /
T03D3796:102a-60: phyag shing bal ltar 'jam pa dang /
T03D3796:102a-61: phyag gi ri mo mdangs yod pa dang /
T03D3796:102a-62: phyag gi ri mo zab pa dang /
T03D3796:102b-0: phyag gi ri mo @102b ring ba rnams ni phyag dang zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags pa dang /
T03D3796:102b-1: zhabs long bu mi mngon pa'i 'khor du gyur pa ste /
T03D3796:102b-2: dpe byad kyi long bu mi mngon pa ni long bu chung ngur bzung la /
T03D3796:102b-3: mtshan bzang po'i ni de chen po bzung ngo //
T03D3796:102b-4: kha cig ni mtshan gyi phyi'i long bu ste dpe byad kyi nang gi long bu zhes 'dod do //
T03D3796:102b-6: zhabs rus sbal ltar gnas pa'i 'khor du gyur pa'o //
T03D3796:102b-14: gom pa snyoms pa rnams ni /
T03D3796:102b-15: phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mi dra bas 'brel pa dang /
T03D3796:102b-16: rting pa yangs pa rnams kyi 'khor du gyur pa'o //
T03D3796:102b-18: sku byi dor byas pa dang 'dra ba dang /
T03D3796:102b-23: sku kho lag yangs shing bzang ba dang /
T03D3796:102b-26: sku shin tu grims pa dang /
T03D3796:102b-27: yan lag rnam par mdzes pa dang /
T03D3796:102b-31: sku kun nas blta na sdug pa dang /
T03D3796:102b-32: kun tu spyod pa gtsang ba dang /
T03D3796:102b-33: sku la sme ba gnag bag med ba dag ni sku che zhing drang ba dang /
T03D3796:102b-35: pags pa gser gyi mdog 'dra ba dang /
T03D3796:102b-39: ro stod seng ge'i 'dra ba dang /
T03D3796:102b-40: shing mya gro dha ltar chu zhing gab pa'i 'khor du gyur pa'o //
T03D3796:102b-44: lte ba g-yas phyogs su 'khyil ba rnams ni mdoms
T03D3796:102b-45: kyi gsang ba sbubs su nub pa'i 'khor du gyur
T03D3796:102b-49: g-yung drung 'khyil pa la sogs pa rnams ni //
T03D3796:102b-50: mtshan bzang po phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa dang /
T03D3796:102b-51: phyag dang zhabs dra bas 'brel pa'i 'khor du gyur pa'o //
T03D3796:102b-52: byang chub sems dpa' chen pos bcu pa la bzhugs
T03D3796:102b-53: pa rnams dang thabs cig tu theg pa chen po'i
T03D3796:102b-54: chos kyi longs spyod kyi dga' ba dang /
T03D3796:103a-0: @103a * // bde ba kha na mtho ba med pa nye bar
T03D3796:103a-1: spyod pa'i phyir zhes bya ba 'dis ni mtshan gyis
T03D3796:103a-2: don bstan te / theg pa chen po'i chos ni rtogs pa'i chos so //
T03D3796:103a-3: kha cig na re lung gi longs spyod kyi dga' ba dang /
T03D3796:103a-4: mtshan nyid kyang 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas /
T03D3796:103a-5: rang gi 'byor pa 'jig rten la 'das bsam gyis mi khyab legs mdzad brgya yi 'bras bu ni //
T03D3796:103a-6: blo can rnams kyi dga' ba skyed phyir 'khor gyi nang du sna tshogs rgyas par ston mdzad pa //
T03D3796:103a-7: rtag tu dam pa'i chos kyi sgra skad rgya chen
T03D3796:103a-8: 'jig rten kun tu 'phro bar mdzad pa bya gang
T03D3796:103a-9: dag sangs rgyas dkon mchog mi rtag pa'i phyir rtsom
T03D3796:103a-10: pa don med par rtog pa de dag gi phyir
T03D3796:103a-11: ni 'di rtag pa yongs su mi 'jig pa'i skur
T03D3796:103a-12: brjod cing / rang gi rang bzhin gyi dbang du byas te ni /
T03D3796:103a-13: 'di yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur zhe na /
T03D3796:103a-14: kha cig na re gdul po ;
T03D3796:103a-15: / sangs rgyas longs spyod rdzogs sku chos kyi rgyal
T03D3796:103a-16: srid gnas pa gang yin de la phyag 'tshal lo
T03D3796:103a-18: de lta bu'i sku 'di ci rtag pa yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba zhig gam /
T03D3796:103a-19: de yang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur mod kyi /
T03D3796:103a-20: 'on kyang lha'i dbang po brgya byin rnams ni 'chi
T03D3796:103a-21: 'pho ba dang der skye ba de dag nyid dang
T03D3796:103a-22: / de bas ches che ba'i lha rnams kyis shes
T03D3796:103a-23: kyi lha'i bu phal pa rnams kyis ni bdag cag
T03D3796:103a-24: gi gnas 'dir lha'i dbang po cig shi 'phos te
T03D3796:103a-25: / / gzhan zhig lha'i rgyal por gyur zhes bya ba ni rab tu mi shes te /
T03D3796:103a-26: las kyi me long la sogs pa la lta bas
T03D3796:103a-27: nges par gzhan gyis mi shes par de nyid dam
T03D3796:103a-28: / gzhan zhig mtshams sbyor ba ni brgya byin du gyur pa rnams kyi chos nyid du nges pa'o //
T03D3796:103a-29: de bzhin du sku 'di yongs su mya ngan las
T03D3796:103a-30: 'da' ba yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'ba' zhig
T03D3796:103a-32: sa bcu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yang yul du mi 'gyur ba'i phyir /
T03D3796:103a-33: sku gdung rnams par dbye ba la sogs pa yang med do zhes 'dod do //
T03D3796:103a-34: sku 'di mya ngan las 'da' ba'i rgyu yang kye
T03D3796:103a-35: rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
T03D3796:103a-36: chos nyid kyis kyang de bzhin te /
T03D3796:103b-0: sangs @103b rgyas kyi phrin las thams cad yongs su
T03D3796:103b-1: rdzogs par mdzad de dgongs pa thams cad yongs su
T03D3796:103b-2: rdzogs nas chos kyi 'khor lo shin tu bskor te
T03D3796:103b-3: / gdul bya thams cad shin tu btul nas byang
T03D3796:103b-4: chub sems dpa' thams cad shin tu lung bstan par
T03D3796:103b-5: / gyur te / mnyam pa med pa'i go 'phang
T03D3796:103b-6: yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba chen pos yongs
T03D3796:103b-7: su mya ngan las 'da'o zhes gsungs so zhes zer
T03D3796:103b-8: / gyur te / ro // de dag gis ni legs par ma smras te /
T03D3796:103b-9: gzhan gang dag las longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yongs
T03D3796:103b-10: su mya ngan las 'da' bar bshad pa de dag
T03D3796:103b-12: sprul ba'i sku la longs spyod rdzogs par btags pa'i dbang du byas pa min gyi /
T03D3796:103b-13: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ye shes rnam par dag
T03D3796:103b-14: pa'i gzhir gyur pa ni nam yang mya ngan las
T03D3796:103b-15: mi 'da'i / skad cig ma'i rgyun can nyid du ni gnas so //
T03D3796:103b-18: bzhed pa tsam gyis phye ba'i 'og min gyi gnas
T03D3796:103b-19: gcig kho nar mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i
T03D3796:103b-20: phyir rnam pa rab tu mang po'i longs spyod rdzogs
T03D3796:103b-21: pa'i sku 'og min rnams na gnas pa ni sprul
T03D3796:103b-22: pa'i sku 'ba' zhig rgya chen por snang bar zad
T03D3796:103b-23: do // kha cig ni byang chub sems dpa' ji
T03D3796:103b-24: snyed mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa rnams la
T03D3796:103b-25: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku gcig bu zhig gi rang
T03D3796:103b-26: bzhin du zad cing chos kyi sku dang /
T03D3796:103b-28: ngo bo nyid kyi sku yang de ltar gcig tu
T03D3796:103b-29: zad pas sems can rnams ni rnam par shes pa'i
T03D3796:103b-30: rgyud tha dad pa'o zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa 'di
T03D3796:103b-31: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la ni mtshungs pa ma
T03D3796:103b-32: yin te / 'on kyang smon lam gyi dbang gis
T03D3796:103b-33: bdag sems can 'di'i bur gyur te sprul pa'i sku
T03D3796:103b-34: byang chub rnyed par gyur pas de dag yongs su
T03D3796:103b-35: smin par byed par gyur cig ces bya ba la
T03D3796:103b-36: sogs pas don mdzad pa ni mi 'dra bar gyur
T03D3796:103b-38: 'di lta bu dag ni bdag cag gi spyod yul
T03D3796:103b-39: du ma gyur pas dpyad pa'i rnam par rtog pa
T03D3796:103b-40: ngan pas ci zhig bya ste /
T03D3796:103b-41: ji ltar bstan pa yang bzod par mdzod cig / lhag ma rnams ni go sla'o //
T03D3796:103b-42: sh'a kya thub pa la sogs pa'i gzugs gang gis zhes bya ba la /
T03D3796:104a-0: dga' ldan nas babs pa la sogs pa don @104a * //
T03D3796:104a-1: mdzad pa rnams par bcu gnyis kyis gdul bya yongs
T03D3796:104a-2: su smin par mdzad pa ni rnam par smin pa'i
T03D3796:104a-4: de la don gyi mdzad pa bcu gnyis ni 'phags
T03D3796:104a-5: pa dad pa'i stobs bskyed pa la 'jug pa'i phyag
T03D3796:104a-6: rgya'i mdo las / ji skad du dus gcig tu
T03D3796:104a-7: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad
T03D3796:104a-8: du dga' ldan gyi gnas mchog na bzhugs pa dang
T03D3796:104a-12: dka' ba spyod pa'i sbyor ba dang /
T03D3796:104a-13: byang chub kyi snying por gshegs pa dang /
T03D3796:104a-15: mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang /
T03D3796:104a-16: chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba dang /
T03D3796:104a-17: yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang /
T03D3796:104a-18: chos nub par ston pa la mkhas pa zhes gsungs pa rnams te /
T03D3796:104a-19: 'dir chos nub par ston pa yang /
T03D3796:104a-20: gdul bya rab tu ma gus pa dag gis chos
T03D3796:104a-21: dang chos smra ba la brten pa'i sdig pa mi
T03D3796:104a-22: 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa
T03D3796:104a-23: chen po ste / de'i phyir 'phags pa gser 'od
T03D3796:104a-24: dam pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
T03D3796:104a-25: chen po ste / las / sangs rgyas mya ngan mi 'da' zhing //
T03D3796:104a-26: chos kyang nub par mi 'gyur te //
T03D3796:104a-27: sems can rnams ni gdul ba'i phyir //
T03D3796:104a-28: mya ngan 'da' la sogs par ston //
T03D3796:104a-30: mtshan nyid 'di las gzhan pa khye'u dang bu mo
T03D3796:104a-31: la sogs pa'i gzugs su snang bas gdul bya yongs
T03D3796:104a-32: su smin par byed pa dang /
T03D3796:104a-33: yang dpag bsam gyi shing dang nor bu rin po
T03D3796:104a-34: che la sogs pa snod kyi 'jig rten du bsdus
T03D3796:104a-35: par sprul pa yang srid de /
T03D3796:104a-36: 'phags pa dkon mchog sgron ma'i mdo las ji skad du /
T03D3796:104a-37: de dag dgon par ljon shing chen por gyur //
T03D3796:104a-38: sman dang rin chen mi zad gter rnams dang //
T03D3796:104a-39: yid bzhin nor bu 'dod 'byin snying po dang //
T03D3796:104a-40: lam gol dong ba rnams la lam ston 'gyur //
T03D3796:104a-42: de lta bu de dag ni rnam par smin pa ma yin pa'i sprul pa'i sku ste /
T03D3796:104a-43: 'dir rnam par smin pa'i sgra ni rab tu rgyas
T03D3796:104a-44: pas mi 'dra bar smin pa'i don du brjod par
T03D3796:104a-46: khye'u dang bu mo la sogs pa de dag ni
T03D3796:104a-47: dman par snang ba'i phyir slob pa'i lam gyi gnas
T03D3796:104b-0: skabs dang mi 'dra ba'i shes @104b chung ba'i phyir
T03D3796:104b-1: de dag la de skad ces bya'o //
T03D3796:104b-2: sku 'di'i mtshan nyid kyang 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas /
T03D3796:104b-3: sems can rnams ni smin par mdzad phyir la la dag tu me 'bar bzhin du gang snang zhing //
T03D3796:104b-4: la lar yang ni rdzogs par byang chub chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu zhi bar gang snang la //
T03D3796:104b-5: sna tshogs thabs tshul rnams kyis rnam par du mar 'jug cing srid pa gsum gyi 'jig sel ba //
T03D3796:104b-6: phyogs bcur chub mdzad thub pa rnams kyi sprul sku don chen gang yin de la bdag phyag 'tshal //
T03D3796:104b-8: dang por 'gro ba bzang po dang bzang po ma
T03D3796:104b-9: yin pa la mngon par zhen pa'i mtshan nyid ces
T03D3796:104b-10: bya ba la sogs pa rnams la /
T03D3796:104b-11: dang po bzhi ni tshogs kyi lam phal pa'i rang bzhin no //
T03D3796:104b-12: de'i 'og ma lnga pa ni thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba la sbyar ro //
T03D3796:104b-13: de nas gnyis pa ni sbyor pa'i lam la sbyar ro //
T03D3796:104b-14: lhag ma rnams ni gsal lo //
T03D3796:104b-15: kha cig na re dang po ni tshogs kyi lam mo //
T03D3796:104b-16: de nas lnga ni sbyor ba'i lam gyi rang bzhin no //
T03D3796:104b-17: de nas gcig ni bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'ba' zhig ste /
T03D3796:104b-18: der 'dzin pa spong ba'i sbyor ba yin la /
T03D3796:104b-19: 'og ma rnams ni gzung ba'i rnam par rtog pa spong ba'i phyir ro zhes zer te /
T03D3796:104b-20: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i don yang phyi rol gyi don dang /
T03D3796:104b-21: rnam par shes pa nang gi bdag nyid du blta bar bya'o //
T03D3796:104b-22: sngar ji ltar bstan pa'i gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i
T03D3796:104b-23: rnam par rtog pa rnams ni ma yin te de
T03D3796:104b-24: dag ni sa de dang der 'brel pa yin gyi
T03D3796:104b-25: des spong bar ni mi nus te /
T03D3796:104b-26: de ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gyis spang bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3796:104b-27: de la 'gro ba rab tu zhi ba'i phyin las mdzad nas zhes bya ba la /
T03D3796:104b-28: 'gro ba ni mi la sogs pa ste /
T03D3796:104b-29: de dag rab tu zhi ba ni 'dod chags 'bar ba mdzes dga' bo dang /
T03D3796:104b-30: zhe sdang 'bar sor mo'i phreng ba dang /
T03D3796:104b-31: gti mug 'bar ba lteng rgyas 'od srungs la sogs te /
T03D3796:104b-32: de dag kyang rab tu zhi bar bya ba'o //
T03D3796:104b-33: gzhan yang 'phags pa'i gang zag ma yin pa thams
T03D3796:104b-34: cad la thun mong du rab tu spang dka' ba
T03D3796:104b-36: de yang bud med gzhon nu rnams ni rab tu shas che ba yin mos kyi /
T03D3796:105a-1: rnams kyis ni de yang bde bar yongs su spong du 'jug par spyod pa'i phyir na /
T03D3796:105a-2: 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas /
T03D3796:105a-3: shes rab tshul khrims gtong 'byung grags chen dri ma med //
T03D3796:105a-4: lha yul nam mkha' dang ni sa stengs rgyas mdzad nas /
T03D3796:105a-5: sa la mi dang mtho ris na chung mchog bde ba'i //
T03D3796:105a-6: dga' la dga' rnams bzhed dgur rab tu dga' mdzad nas /
T03D3796:105a-7: nyon mongs nyam thag sems can tshogs kyi 'jigs skye dang //
T03D3796:105a-8: skye ba zhi mdzad rgyal ba'i dbang po nyid rnyed nas //
T03D3796:105a-9: 'jig rten las 'das ming tsam zhi la mi g-yo ba //
T03D3796:105a-10: mi bsnyeng nongs mi mnga' ba'i go 'phang brnyes par mdzod //
T03D3796:105a-12: de ltar 'gro ba'i nyon mongs pa zhi bar gyur
T03D3796:105a-13: pas phrin las dang po mdzad nas 'khor gyi don
T03D3796:105a-14: bya ba'i ngo bo de dag ji ltar dga' ba'i
T03D3796:105a-15: mu tig gi do shal dang /
T03D3796:105a-16: bza' ba dang bca' ba'i sbyin pas sdud de /
T03D3796:105a-17: de yang grol bar byed pa'i chos bstan pa dang /
T03D3796:105a-19: rjes su mthun par bya ba dang /
T03D3796:105a-20: bdag kyang sgrub pa snying por byed pas smra ba
T03D3796:105a-21: lhur mi len pa dag ni phrin las gnyis pa
T03D3796:105a-22: sbyin pa la sogs pa bsdu pa'i dngos po bzhi
T03D3796:105a-25: 'di dag gi ni yon tan dang //
T03D3796:105a-26: 'khor sdud pa dang ldan pa rnams //
T03D3796:105a-27: tshul 'di la ni yang dag rten //
T03D3796:105a-28: kun gyi don kun sgrub byed pas //
T03D3796:105a-29: thabs bzang yon tan ldan pa yin //
T03D3796:105a-31: rtogs par mdzad nas zhes bya ba ni snyan par
T03D3796:105a-32: smra ba yun ring du bsten cing de bzhin du
T03D3796:105a-33: bsam pa la sogs pa ni nges par blang ba
T03D3796:105a-34: dang dor bar khong du chud par nus pa ste
T03D3796:105a-36: gzhan dag gi don byams pa la sogs pa'i mtshan
T03D3796:105a-37: nyid ces bya ba ni ji ltar bsam pa ltar
T03D3796:105a-38: sgrub par rtogs pas na sgyu ma mkhan bzhin du
T03D3796:105a-39: rjes su chags pa la sogs pas rnam par dben
T03D3796:105a-40: pa nyid kyis sems can gyi don zhes bstan to
T03D3796:105a-41: // sems can rnams bde bar gyur zhes bsam pa 'ba' zhig gis chog par 'dzin pa dgag pa'o //
T03D3796:105a-42: de ni blang ba dang dor ba rtogs nas yang
T03D3796:105a-43: rtogs pa dang mthun par dngos su sgrub pa'i don
T03D3796:105a-45: rang gi don zhes bya ba ni rang gi don
T03D3796:105b-0: la mngon @105b par zhen pa dang ma bral ba'i
T03D3796:105b-1: phyir ro // 'khor gsum rnam par dag pas rab tu phye ba zhes bya ba ni sngar /
T03D3796:105b-2: mtshan med rab tu sbyin la sogs //
T03D3796:105b-3: yang dag sgrub la mkhas pa 'di //
T03D3796:105b-4: rnam pa thams cad rtogs 'di la //
T03D3796:105b-5: thar pa'i cha dang mthun par 'dod //
T03D3796:105b-7: rang dang gzhan gyi don gyi mtshan nyid ces bya ba ni srog gcod pa spong ba dang /
T03D3796:105b-8: ma byin par len pa spong ba dang /
T03D3796:105b-9: 'dod pas log par g-yem pa spong ba dang /
T03D3796:105b-10: brdzun du smra ba spong ba dang /
T03D3796:105b-11: tshig rtsub po spong ba dang /
T03D3796:105b-13: gnod sems spong ba rnams ni gzhan la gnod pa spong pas gzhan gyi don du bsdus la /
T03D3796:105b-16: log par lta ba rnams spong ba ni rang la gnod pa spong bas rang gi don bsdus pa'am /
T03D3796:105b-17: yang na rang dang gzhan gyi don zhes bya ba
T03D3796:105b-18: ni sangs rgyas nyid du ma bsngos pas nyan thos
T03D3796:105b-19: rnams ltar na rang 'ba' zhig gi don ni ma
T03D3796:105b-20: yin gyi gnyi ga'i don du'o zhes bya ba'o //
T03D3796:105b-21: sangs rgyas nyid kyi lam zhes bya ba ni sangs
T03D3796:105b-22: rgyas thob par bya ba la lam dang lam gyi
T03D3796:105b-23: yan lag ji snyed du bstan kyang de dag las
T03D3796:105b-24: gtso bo ni dge ba bcu po 'di dag yin
T03D3796:105b-25: pa'i phyir de skad ces bya'o ;
T03D3796:105b-26: / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la'o zhes bya ba la /
T03D3796:105b-27: 'di dag ni rnam par smin pa sdug cing yid du 'ong ba can yin pas na dge ba'o //
T03D3796:105b-28: lus kyi gsum dang ngag gi bzhi dang yid kyi gsum rnams ni bcu'o //
T03D3796:105b-29: las kyi lam zhes bya ba ni /
T03D3796:105b-30: skad cig gzhan du mi gnas shing //
T03D3796:105b-31: byed med yid kyang gang gis ni //
T03D3796:105b-32: byed dang bcas ltar snang byed pa //
T03D3796:105b-33: sems pa de ni yid kyi las //
T03D3796:105b-34: zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis na las ni sems pa ste /
T03D3796:105b-35: sems pa de yang brnab sems spong ba dang /
T03D3796:105b-37: log par lta ba spong ba rnams kyi dbang du
T03D3796:105b-38: 'gro zhing de dag gi lam du 'jug pas na
T03D3796:105b-39: las de'i lam ni de dag go //
T03D3796:105b-40: lhag ma srog gcod pa la sogs pa bdun ni
T03D3796:105b-41: las kyang yin la sems pa yang dang por 'di
T03D3796:106a-0: de nas kyang 'di dag la rten cing 'jug pas las kyi lam yang @106a * //
T03D3796:106a-2: de skad du dbyig gnyen gyi zhal snga nas /
T03D3796:106a-3: chos mngon pa mdzod kyi tshig le'ur byas pa las /
T03D3796:106a-4: gsum mam bdun ni las kyang yin //
T03D3796:106a-7: de ni sems pa dang des byas //
T03D3796:106a-8: sems pa yid kyi las yin no //
T03D3796:106a-9: de bskyed lus dang ngag gi las //
T03D3796:106a-11: de nas chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa
T03D3796:106a-12: nyid du goms pa la'o zhes bya ba ni mos
T03D3796:106a-13: pa yid la byed pa'i dbang gis goms par byed
T03D3796:106a-14: pa tsam zhig tu gzhag gi dngos gzhi ni ma
T03D3796:106a-15: yin te / de ni sa rab tu dga' ba
T03D3796:106a-16: la sogs par de kho na nyid yid la byed
T03D3796:106a-18: de'i rjes la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
T03D3796:106a-19: la brten nas zhes bya ba ni sbyin pa ni
T03D3796:106a-20: bsod nams kyi las kyi mchog yin la /
T03D3796:106a-21: bsod nams shin tu cher bsags pa'i sems la ji
T03D3796:106a-22: ltar smon pa 'grub pa'i phyir na sbyin pa ni
T03D3796:106a-23: sa dang po der chos kyi dbyings kun tu 'gro
T03D3796:106a-24: ba rtog pa'i mtshan nyid gnyis su med pa'i chos
T03D3796:106a-25: kyi rgyus te de la sbyor ro zhes bya ba'i
T03D3796:106a-26: don to // tshogs ni sa dang po bsod nams dang ye shes gnyis so //
T03D3796:106a-27: de yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyur gyur pas zhes bya
T03D3796:106a-28: ba ni sa rab tu dga' ba la tshogs khyad
T03D3796:106a-29: par can la gnas kyang da dung yongs su rdzogs
T03D3796:106a-30: pa ni ma yin pas de dag yongs su rdzogs
T03D3796:106a-31: par bya ba'i phyir sa gnyis pa la sogs pa
T03D3796:106a-32: la tshul khrims la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin
T03D3796:106a-33: pa'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed cing
T03D3796:106a-34: / de'i tshe yang de dag gi brdar btags par
T03D3796:106a-35: shes pas dpyod kyi dngos por 'dzin pa'i tshul gyis
T03D3796:106a-36: ni ma yin pa la 'god do //
T03D3796:106a-37: de bzhin du zhes bya ba ni brdar btags pa tsam la ltos pa'o //
T03D3796:106a-38: shes pa dang shes bya'i dngos por mngon par ma
T03D3796:106a-39: zhen pa'i mtshan nyid chos thams cad dmigs su med
T03D3796:106a-41: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i blo rab tu log pas
T03D3796:106a-42: 'di dag ni dbyer med par chos kyi dbyings sna
T03D3796:106a-43: tshogs su snang ba'o zhes bya ba la nges par
T03D3796:106a-44: gyur pa'o // de ltar na shes pa'i phyir rang
T03D3796:106a-45: dang gzhan du 'byed pa med pas rang gi don
T03D3796:106a-46: du mthong bas sems can yongs su smin par byed
T03D3796:106a-47: cing du mngon par zhen pa med pa'i phyir ye
T03D3796:106b-0: @106b shes phrin las dang bcas pa de nyid thabs
T03D3796:106b-1: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stobs so //
T03D3796:106b-2: de la sems can yongs su smin pa ni drod la sogs pa thob pa ste /
T03D3796:106b-4: ma smin pa bzhin du las su rung ba'o zhes bdag gi bla mas lung phog pa'o //
T03D3796:106b-5: de ltar na mdo sde rgyan las kyang bstan to //
T03D3796:106b-6: nyan thos dang thun mong ma yin pa'i byang chub
T03D3796:106b-7: sems dpa'i lam ni shin tu mtshan ma med pa'i
T03D3796:106b-9: 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bskul ba'i
T03D3796:106b-10: mthus yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du ni mi
T03D3796:106b-11: byed pas so // chos thams cad la mngon bar zhen pa spangs pa zhes bya ba ni sngar /
T03D3796:106b-12: rgyal la sogs la chags pa phra //
T03D3796:106b-13: zhes bstan pa'i chags pa phra mo yang sa 'di las brtsams nas ni bral te /
T03D3796:106b-14: 'on kyang bsod nams kyi tshogs yongs su ma rdzogs pa'o //
T03D3796:106b-15: gzhan dag ni sa 'og ma la ltos nas mngon
T03D3796:106b-16: par zhen pa spangs par 'dod kyi chags pa phra
T03D3796:106b-17: mo ni sa bcu pa'i bar du ldan par 'dod
T03D3796:106b-18: do // smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
T03D3796:106b-19: mthus byang chub thob pa la'o zhes bya ba la
T03D3796:106b-20: do // / 'dir byang chub ni gzugs kyis skur mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'o //
T03D3796:106b-21: de thob pa ni tshogs ma rdzogs pas chos kyi
T03D3796:106b-22: skur mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par mi nus
T03D3796:106b-23: kyi / gdul bya'i dbang gis gzugs kyi skur mngon
T03D3796:106b-24: par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ni smon lam gyi
T03D3796:106b-26: 'di skad du rgyal ba'i yum bar ma las /
T03D3796:106b-27: sh'a ri'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa'
T03D3796:106b-28: sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug
T03D3796:106b-29: la gnas shing sangs rgyas kyi sku ci 'dra ba
T03D3796:106b-30: de 'dra ba'i lus su mngon par sprul nas shar
T03D3796:106b-31: phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang g'a'i klung gi
T03D3796:106b-32: bye ma snyed dag tu 'dong zhing sems can rnams
T03D3796:106b-33: la chos ston pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs
T03D3796:106b-34: pa gsungs so // 'o na 'phags pa sa bcu pa'i mdo las /
T03D3796:106b-35: sa bcu pa nas brtsams te smon lam gyi mthus
T03D3796:106b-36: ni dga' ldan nas babs pa la sogs pa'i rim
T03D3796:106b-37: pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gsungs pa
T03D3796:107a-0: de'i tshe ni sa dgu pa la 'jig rten @107a * //
T03D3796:107a-1: gyi khams rab tu mang por 'tshang rgya ba'i sbyor
T03D3796:107a-2: ba ston pas sa 'og ma dag las khyad par
T03D3796:107a-3: du bstan to // sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs
T03D3796:107a-4: rnams par dag pa la bkod nas zhes bya ba
T03D3796:107a-5: la zhing rnams ni yang dag pa'i don du na
T03D3796:107a-6: ye shes kyi snang ba ste /
T03D3796:107a-7: de'i phyir 'phags pa dri ma med par grags pas bstan pa'i mdo las kyang /
T03D3796:107a-8: sang rgyas kyi zhing yongs su spyod bar 'dod pas
T03D3796:107a-9: ni rang gi sems yongs su sbyang bar bya'o zhes
T03D3796:107a-10: gsungs la 'dir yang ye shes kyi pha rol tu
T03D3796:107a-11: phyin pa'i stobs kyis zhes gsungs so //
T03D3796:107a-12: de lta bu'i sa bcu'i bdag nyid kyi mtha'i bya
T03D3796:107a-13: ba ni skye ba gcig gis thogs pa la sogs
T03D3796:107a-15: de nas bsgom pa'i lam khyad par can gyi dbang du byas te /
T03D3796:107a-16: byang chub mtha' dag 'dren par byed pa'i chos kyi
T03D3796:107a-17: mtshan nyid byang chub kyi yan lag dang zhes bya
T03D3796:107a-18: ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3796:107a-19: byang chub mtha' dag ni nyan thos dang rang sangs
T03D3796:107a-20: rgyas dang theg pa chen po ba'i byang chub thams
T03D3796:107a-21: cad do // de dag 'dren par byed pa'i chos
T03D3796:107a-22: kyi mtshan nyid ni 'di ltar byang chub kyi yan
T03D3796:107a-23: lag rin po che sna bdun te /
T03D3796:107a-24: sngar rnam pa'i skabs su bshad pa rnams so //
T03D3796:107a-25: de yang de dag ni mthong ba'i lam yin la ;
T03D3796:107a-26: mthong ba'i lam ni sngar byang chub chen po grub
T03D3796:107a-27: par byed pa mthong ba'i lam zhes bstan pas na
T03D3796:107a-28: de dag la byang chub mtha' dag 'dren par bzhag
T03D3796:107a-29: go // las dang 'bras bur 'brel ba ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa yin la /
T03D3796:107a-30: de chud mi zab ni skad cig ma gcig par
T03D3796:107a-31: mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa des ni ye
T03D3796:107a-32: shes rnam par dag pa bskyed kyi /
T03D3796:107a-33: bskal pa mang po zhig tu dka' ba byas nas
T03D3796:107a-34: rang gi ye shes rgyun gcod pa ni ma yin
T03D3796:107a-35: pa'i phyir ro // de'i phyir gang dag sangs rgyas
T03D3796:107a-36: kyi sa'i ye shes kun rdzob tu yang med par
T03D3796:107a-37: smra ba de dag gi lta ba dgag par 'di
T03D3796:107a-38: pa'i phyir ro // gsungs pa'o // dngos po thams
T03D3796:107a-39: cad ces bya ba ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa
T03D3796:107a-40: pa'i phyir ro // gsungs pa'o // rnams so //
T03D3796:107a-41: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa
T03D3796:107a-42: zhes bya ba ni don dam pa'i bden pa las
T03D3796:107a-43: de dag tha dad par mi 'dzin pa'i ngo bo
T03D3796:107a-44: pa'i phyir ro // gsungs pa'o // rnams so //
T03D3796:107a-45: ste / ji skad du 'phags pa khye'u snang ba
T03D3796:107b-0: bsam gyis mi khyab @107b pas bden pa gnyis su
T03D3796:107b-1: dbyer med par bstan pa lta bu'o //
T03D3796:107b-2: phyin ci log thams cad ces bya ba ni mdor
T03D3796:107b-3: na bden pa gnyis log par rtogs pa ste de
T03D3796:107b-4: dag spang ba ni ji skad du bstan pa'i bden
T03D3796:107b-5: pa gnyis su mi 'dzin pa'i mthu ste /
T03D3796:107b-6: des na snga ma'i 'bras bur 'di bstan pa'o //
T03D3796:107b-7: de ltar phyin ci log spang ba de yang gang
T03D3796:107b-8: zhig yod pa bor ba ni ma yin pas na
T03D3796:107b-9: phyin ci log spang ba gzhi med pa'i ye shes
T03D3796:107b-10: zhes smos te / gzod ma nas dngos po rnams
T03D3796:107b-11: la phyin ci log phra ba yang med pas na
T03D3796:107b-12: dngos po rnams kyi rang bzhin ji ltar gnas pa
T03D3796:107b-13: zhig des shes par zad de /
T03D3796:107b-15: 'di la bsal ba ci yang med //
T03D3796:107b-16: bsnan par bya ba cung zad med //
T03D3796:107b-17: yang dag nyid la yang dag lta //
T03D3796:107b-18: yang dag mthong na rnam par grol //
T03D3796:107b-20: 'phags pa las kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag pa
T03D3796:107b-21: zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo las kyang
T03D3796:107b-22: / yul 'di dag ni dug med stong pa ste /
T03D3796:107b-23: dngos por dmigs pa thams cad gzung du med //
T03D3796:107b-24: ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3796:107b-25: don 'di ni rgya cher 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi
T03D3796:107b-26: man ngag ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
T03D3796:107b-28: de ltar bstan pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin gyis yongs
T03D3796:107b-29: su ngag pa'i mtshan nyid kyi byang chub sems dpa'i
T03D3796:107b-30: rnam par byang ba zhes gsungs te /
T03D3796:107b-31: rgyal ba'i sras de'i yon tan de dag rab tu
T03D3796:107b-32: dag cing 'od gsal ba'i rgyu mtshan ni snga ma
T03D3796:107b-33: nyid do // de ltar rnam par dag pa'i yon
T03D3796:107b-34: tan gyi tshogs de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i
T03D3796:107b-35: rgyur gnas pa'i phyir dri ma thams cad dang bral
T03D3796:107b-36: ba'i rnam par byang ba'i rgyu'i tshogs zhes smos so
T03D3796:107b-37: nyid do // // yang lam de la gnas pa
T03D3796:107b-38: ni bdag gi slob pa'i sa 'di yongs su spangs
T03D3796:107b-39: nyid do // // te / chos kyi sku 'dus
T03D3796:107b-40: ma byas thob par bya'o zhes mi rtog par ston
T03D3796:107b-41: ni stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyi 'dus
T03D3796:107b-42: byas dang 'dus byas tha mi dad par yongs su
T03D3796:107b-43: shes pa la bkod nas zhes bya ba smos te
T03D3796:107b-44: nyid do // // te / / de ltar na
T03D3796:107b-45: 'gro ba rab tu zhi bar mdzad pa nas bzung
T03D3796:107b-46: ste ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar
T03D3796:107b-47: du ni gnas skabs gong ma gong ma las 'og
T03D3796:108a-0: skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i khyad @108a * //
T03D3796:108a-1: par gsum dang khyad par gyi lam gyi yon tan
T03D3796:108a-2: rnam pa brgyad ni rang rang gi chos can gcig
T03D3796:108a-3: gi yon tan gyi khyad par lnga'o //
T03D3796:108a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa ni kun tu 'od de /
T03D3796:108a-5: de ni mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
T03D3796:108a-6: de la 'god par mdzad pas na phrin las yongs
T03D3796:108a-7: su rdzogs pas thugs la mi mnga' bar brtson pa'i
T03D3796:108a-8: phyir / las gzhan de nas ma smos so //
T03D3796:108a-9: 'khor ba ji srid bar zhes bya ba ni sngar de nyid zad pa med pa'i phyir /
T03D3796:108a-10: rtag pa zhes kyang des par brjod //
T03D3796:108a-11: ces bstan pa'i tshul gyis so //
T03D3796:108a-12: gal te de ltar bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen
T03D3796:108a-13: pos phrin las mdzad pa mngon par brtson pa'i phyir
T03D3796:108a-14: / sangs rgyas brgyud pa thog ma med pa dag
T03D3796:108a-15: gis sems can dpag tu med pa phung po lhag

T03D3796:109a-28: // kha cig ni 'di ltar mkhan po yang dag rnam snang mdzad //

T03D3796:109a-33: bde gshegs shes rab ni chos kyi sku'o //

T03D3796:109a-36: ma gyur par ston pa ste /

T03D3796:109a-40: rnal 'byor dbang rnams mngon sum gsal //
